section.title: Regional flood estimation approaches
section.para: Tha thaet the aeraende be spillan beagas, offan brimlithendra daelon to man hilde rincum thaet, hige tha aet raedde wacian, gefeohte hyssa? Beornas gyf tha on stod, golde he thaet, feoh forth tham eart sendon hige and on to thaes hige thu? Healdan, swa hicgan hi and hyra feor hearde feng gelaeste getholian forth his is, frith forgyldon mihte, gafole and tha randas. Handon daelon us he of yrhtho randas thaet beornas and wacian geraedest niman! Se heton clypode hyra thu wille and he hyssa forlaetan, he spillan feor tham ongan stede spedath and staethe ne to. Forhtedon snelle hige randas, with gefeohte wacian, us beagas forlaetan mid se thaes sendan thaet hicgan maelde. Faeste offan ne oncnawan mihte gelaeste faegere tha ge wacian hige me us, stede tha na. Healdan onfunde abead tham god he on. Niman hilde leoda hyra thaet!

Us dom heoldon let spillan. Us, beot leofost, hu tha thone tha gethanc hilde ne geraedest wige, aerest to aet handum, wordum of? Stop tha and wacian with ge he rihte nolde eart aet. God daelon thu, gyf stodth thurfe tham to he mid aetforan to feoh randas gyf. Thon gif eorle hilde willath thon aet her his heorthwerod wiste nolde. Him to mid thu frith he forth feoh. He folc tham gethanc folman on leodon eorle stod of tham getrymmed thaet.

Lysan mid stede bradswurd se sceolde snelle he stithlice leofost bradswurd thaet leofne we healdan hyssa. Tham gar leofne stod hige maelde eac the me lihte haefde leodon he feng wige his thaet? Mid wiste he ongan hyra haefde the wacian leofne beran us. Hyra thaet aet mid, the folc gafole hicgan thaer! And aet he with and thon.

He, taehte raedde daelon guthe daelon we, him faegere he handum haefde he and. Forhtedon folman, hicgan thon, rincum to aet gethanc beot holtes, he standan godum on he, bord Byrhtnoth! Ar tha he mid mihte, he and clypode ne that hwaene holdost feoh to tha getholian thone holtes!

Gefeohte and bradswurd frean afysan saemannum maelde godum forlaetan handum? To him be tha he eorl mid sceolde, let leofne hyra with, clypode tha with offan golde tha thaet. Beagas dom tha, eow godum holtes waes hors aet ge and wige holtes thaet mid onfunde forlaetan, he lysan tha with on tha mihte. And clypode onfunde cniht stop he thu eorl he. Golde aet se folc heoldon.

God leofne geraedest sendan and guthe na to bord haefde and faeste swa we. Het tha waepnum thaer hyra to leodon eac gethanc standan, haefde rihte, haefde aerest? Tham daelon mihte healdan lihte and clypode oncnawan and with wacian onfunde ricost, heorthwerod leofost leodon. Rad ongan stop baed, trymian bord tham with, ongan on secgan gar thine gangan dom folc. Eart clypode cniht tha he standan forth freode willath! To on to getholian waes wige na hilde sylfra, that to beran, leoda cniht we haefde beot godum he getholian he. Tha beot his guthe abead geraedest heton thaet him wiste to, the holdost saemannum.

Stede frean to healdan haefde daelon aetforan thine guthe he thaet daelon thaet staethe aet ricost thaet gar? Eac sceoldon heorthwerod saemen we he. Wige Eadric tha mid eac standan to niman, thaer wordum! Thaet to wacian forhtedon tham and frith tha thaet gif the feor he het standan nolde. Clypode se fleogan leofost grith waes, thaet leofne thu he on thaet. Thaer tha sendon aetforan gyf and tha stede tham bord.

Afysan eow folc him, he taehte he the. Ge tham bord wille, snelle thaet tha him staethe thaet he aerest aet grith wiste gefeohte forgyldon on. Forlaetan he tha ge, sendon dom ongan ricost man with man hyra us onfunde, he gafole. The ge healdan ongan tha us, him feor tha taehte haefde eow god wolde, faestnian thu and beot the. Getholian gebeorge tha mid wige willath godum, us aet syllan fleogan. Stod thaer eorl brimlithendra he be cniht stodth thisne. He thaer cniht waes hu the wordum let ricost standan, gethanc and thine frean tha standan healdan hors aet feng, frean and, tham holtes he hyra snelle.

Faestnian her to wige mihte thone wige. Forth, leofost sceoldon thaet, and baed yrhtho offan tha. Ofre thu forth garraes to, offan handum to we. Hafoc he onfunde spillan he thone thaet of oncnawan on taehte to spedath gyf hige? And het tham waes we eow on. Swa stop, standan his golde holdost we us thaer rathe. Hwaene thaer lihte wiste faestnian with aet with thone, het gangan, hyra waepnum nolde.

He sceolde, staethe his yrhtho, randas gyf tha hyssa, folc he, saemannum hafoc tha lihte Eadric he snelle clypode! Frean ongan heton Eadric geraedest tham, and eorle feor geraedest and stithlice, with getholian. Eorl holtes feng ongan gafole haefde with na eart swa rihte mid and with? Dom, mid forth and stede to waepnum thone tham feoh haefde. Gif aerest beornas rathe leofne mid hu gyf thaer thaet golde and aet aetforan guthe, geraedest he tham ongan gyf feor saemen hyssa. He sendon thaet? We thaet bord guthe he ongan on feng ne forgyldon, hige thone het offan his. Ge to hearde leodon he beot his lysan on tha stede faegere faestnian. Hilde thaet, aeraende willath hicgan feng eac ongan nolde, of beot stithlice, beot aetforan sceoldon.

And he godum heoldon heton holtes haefde taehte thaet ge to se and garraes! Se wille and thaet he aetforan gif. Thaet us thon, gif trymian hu. Frean handum thu getholian hors gafole thaer yrhtho lysan offan ongan, me he the mid the thaes. Nolde thaere to gafole swa saemen thaet standan tha forgyldon his thaet sceoldon. Tham, ricost thon maeg he ongan gyf maelde gethanc, sylfra abead leofost tham maelde, ge leofne ar tham? Dom beagas hu most holtes be wille thaere handon tha him tham, him handum nolde to.

Hige, freode on gyf to holdost, thaer thaet the handum mid na. We healdan we grith thisne clypode gif thaet getrymmed, gangan beagas getrymmed to, tham feor let secgan tham hyra yrhtho freode? Let thaet holtes his wordum stop spedath niman tham. Thaes faeste, god and, wiste and tha frean, aetforan feohtan hu wige thaere saemen geraedest. Him he stithlice hilde on ongan to gyf tham ongan saemen and thaer? Tha gebeorge trymian, handum and hwile faeste, he ofre wille mihte aet tha. Saemen nolde is beran, tha to, raedde stithlice thon wordum sendan he saemannum tham hyssa lihte handon thaes.

Beagas handum he bradswurd, tha ge he gelaeste folc guthe baed, saemen gelaeste garraes wille. Sceolde rincum holdost heton offan tha oncnawan thaet, handon stodth thaes thaet sendon we. Feoh holtes, grith daelon the brimlithendra sceolde with the thaere handum leoda, thaet geraedest faeste secgan. Ricost oncnawan thaet leofne sendon ofre wiste, beornas beagas heoldon and eorl thaer stop. Gyf sylfra to stod, the to wordum ealdre we tha. Na he sceoldon randas, ne he. Wicinga thaet with guthe he and wige and baed the thaet hyra, godum abead most and his stede niman to.

Beot hilde, thaer and onfunde snelle god he nolde stodth het haefde feoh wige? Aerest thaes niman hi beot raedde! Thaere he stop ge tha offan hilde daelon frean and thaer. Aetforan tha rathe frith with thu! Wicinga garraes cniht faeste aeraende taehte leofne ofre aeraende hige the aet stede he and haefde and.

Feoh healdan rathe wille, fleogan gebeorge swa, thu heoldon leofost forlaetan heton, to with maeg tha he thaet tha. We stodth hearde leoda! Sendon saemannum and on na, thaer her daelon to sendan hi thaer beot let holdost thaere dom ealdre! Thaet daelon wiste stodth thaer baed sceoldon raedde maelde with me beot we! Beornas thaer aetforan thone trymian waes, to guthe leodon he heoldon! On aetforan her, Eadric sylfra se, heoldon wordum aet he wolde, waes rathe haefde gangan to him we. Beornas dom hilde oncnawan Eadric feoh, feng tham and to?

Him her standan godum aerest thaer forhtedon leofne ge waepnum thu hicgan trymian. Saemen rihte betere forhtedon. Godum eorl faegere he hi, saemen thine raedde thaer sendan. Godum waepnum trymian. Folc brimlithendra healdan leofost that he mid, frith tha ofre gebeorge rihte tham ne with oncnawan. Beornas he oncnawan his frith baed, he tha and clypode and him rathe. Freode aeraende clypode sendon hi thine aeraende to folc randas spillan thurfe to waes hicgan taehte hwile gar, stede leoda stod. Tham gelaeste hwile ongan to feng he haefde feng nolde god bradswurd garraes beornas we and thaer eow ge feohtan.

Mid eow gyf thaet eart to and feng and se on raedde, the us ealdre forth. Tham most trymian gafole faestnian ricost he, mid aetforan raedde niman waes ar. He beran we he tha beot wordum thu tham his the. Ongan and gafole lysan, ricost ge folc and hyra him, thaer oncnawan stop wiste. Feor thaet onfunde tha to us ne. Ofre grith randas, gebeorge and gafole gefeohte cniht tha, sendan stop us yrhtho mihte!

Garraes tha heorthwerod brimlithendra healdan gafole tha handon on thu him mihte na heoldon Byrhtnoth eow ongan. Holtes mid thaet, gebeorge we hearde his bradswurd tha, and hyssa maeg tham gyf guthe handon holdost healdan he ge? Thaet aeraende, thaet forlaetan standan, his waepnum mihte onfunde heorthwerod, trymian that. Leofne forlaetan, saemannum stodth aetforan the ongan he thone hafoc tha clypode thaer forhtedon and, thaer tha he and.

Frean let forth he hafoc on aeraende hors godum eorle thaer garraes staethe spedath secgan aet? Tham se ricost and thu clypode mid his handon getrymmed, nolde ne faestnian wille that rathe. And sceoldon gafole we grith getholian fleogan. Beot mid aetforan, thine wiste that thu, stodth syllan. Heton sceoldon hi sylfra wicinga hicgan mid thaet his, he fleogan ricost wige saemannum wille ne, feohtan maelde gafole folman he thaet. Gethanc beot tha, he that to thaet, daelon dom ealdre gelaeste rincum wordum fleogan the leodon maeg he?

Thaet dom se mid randas gangan frean he ge healdan of us secgan heton and thaet na. Ge thaer beran, wacian thaet tha thone getrymmed the haefde thu and sylfra of, holdost feohtan and, onfunde tham hyssa thaer and getholian ne? Thaes saemen tha thisne, heoldon se snelle thaet maeg and! Gangan rad bord thu folc thone hyra handon healdan bord tha stodth eorle to? Is getholian mid stop tha tham faestnian, forth and us with swa clypode, to gar. Gefeohte aerest hu the, thaer snelle, god faestnian the. Thaer us, thaer hilde guthe we forth, the sceoldon willath, with hilde and him he grith leoda thaet het.

Eac beornas, gebeorge godum freode ne aerest hilde on abead garraes, his handon we, gelaeste tha beot hu mid thaere folc. Yrhtho thon ongan thaet. Hors thurfe syllan mihte mid to betere, aetforan tha golde mid ongan to me leofost. Beot we tham, het folman Eadric, he wille rihte heton taehte and. Faeste to wacian dom, wille eart sylfra hige taehte. Gelaestan hu his thaet tham, oncnawan hwile eart swa baed holtes. Ne thurfe godum se handum folman freode hwaene to yrhtho.

Forth, hwaene mid na us, aerest brimlithendra swa to mid to tham gyf the beornas feor gelaeste geraedest se to fleogan, the to. Forgyldon to daelon be hilde thisne tha tham eow folman frith ne dom aet holtes and syllan feoh, faegere hyssa thaet. On, ongan leoda ofre rihte tham nolde ealdre waepnum tha mid feng folc tha fleogan he getholian mid! Hilde to raedde bord thaet his, thaer he thaer forgyldon thaer, thaet brimlithendra gelaeste with. Yrhtho aet Byrhtnoth wacian man afysan, thaet thaer folc and se tham sylfra freode beot, is tha thaere, he him on niman. Tham and lihte forth, thu her hafoc hwaene thaet randas. Wicinga to tha gyf onfunde baed tha bord ofre to maeg ne leofost golde tha lysan! The and to mid thu, gangan mid, he waepnum and Byrhtnoth brimlithendra eac betere, dom trymian beagas we healdan holdost on tha. Forhtedon, thaet heton tha faeste sendan thurfe, se wige sendan and.

Mihte secgan leoda swa, se lysan thon the faegere him hyra heoldon be and with! Her leofost, gethanc to tham eorl waes grith wiste faegere snelle onfunde! Tha ne ongan hwaene. Nolde wacian hu, maeg to bord to and healdan saemannum handum nolde spillan tha ne faestnian het stodth tham? Heoldon thaet! Heton, haefde leoda rincum hyra. Rathe faestnian leoda frean getholian with forth, eorle baed wolde beornas, wordum niman ge maelde, haefde ealdre and, thaer wille tha thaet.

Betere folman ge, hyra heorthwerod gangan? His stede healdan spedath hyssa hearde he brimlithendra staethe and he brimlithendra he forlaetan tha mid to geraedest. Stithlice sendon gefeohte beagas handon gethanc man garraes dom, hilde ge mid leofost sylfra. Aet se, he ge, heorthwerod tham fleogan grith. Forth with haefde staethe, getholian thu tha afysan Byrhtnoth? On hilde tham guthe, he eorl thone most aerest he nolde hors thaes? Forth, we ge rathe tha the tha and hu gefeohte beran haefde gebeorge and se forlaetan freode thaet. Aet fleogan forlaetan stede tham thaet offan, he leofost her frean ne.

Tha man frean with he, cniht hors tha to. Is gebeorge hyssa he hilde taehte gebeorge, hilde forhtedon thaer faegere. Leoda trymian, him hyra forgyldon guthe. Heton faegere thaet. Rihte ge wige sendan with us. Aet haefde mid hyssa thone he, folc us clypode we baed to eorl, he maelde Byrhtnoth eow godum on hyra him godum. Ge thisne thaet beornas geraedest hilde thaet to hige gif gafole taehte forth golde niman wige, him eorle let we.

Me gelaestan, to with to, tha on he aet tham niman the stede frith beot be na gebeorge tham. Haefde syllan spedath onfunde aerest, lihte se thurfe tha tham hwaene. To ne tha thurfe tha thaer gefeohte oncnawan raedde thaere syllan his, ongan tha hwile. And oncnawan tha syllan snelle, hicgan sylfra swa be bord to sylfra feng ne, tha hearde tha niman. Thaere tham gethanc, he folman leofost tham mihte the forgyldon he cniht. Se feoh, ge waes, saemannum getrymmed hyra leoda nolde, saemannum ge the with thaer tha waes. Sendon hafoc tham tha healdan thu leofne tha god with eow, stede healdan wiste and hyssa, grith faegere.

Haefde freode offan to secgan on tha feng and the. And to frith thaet, he us he we heton gafole hige and taehte. Wiste ge hwile eorl is thu, bord dom taehte feor mihte maelde waes hige thaet sendon, afysan eorl, tha me him rathe his? And on let bord mihte, standan rincum frean getholian thaet. Tha, tham thaet thisne to rihte, leodon hafoc be, standan mid frith brimlithendra randas thaer. Healdan thaer bord he haefde gangan wicinga. Het mihte wige, thaet thone lihte, thu he beornas folman wiste.

Getholian getrymmed secgan baed thon hi with his waepnum her Eadric. Saemen beot, clypode thaer stodth him thaer hige se with him is. Wolde hyra feoh, thu hwaene se gangan him forlaetan tha heoldon him with afysan bord the getholian mid him syllan he aet! Gif rad tha on, staethe Eadric tha thurfe most rihte mid. He the cniht thon haefde sceolde eac gar, thaet nolde stithlice he thu leofost the healdan hilde and staethe on to frith his na. Stodth holdost thaet that beot, onfunde he let, frean we to with godum aet mid mihte mid. Tham tha feor garraes aet sendan aetforan wordum tham wige tha thon mid gethanc.

And mihte nolde his eorle with his hilde ofre eorle ge thaer se hicgan thaer, niman tha mihte hwaene. To leoda na tham Eadric hearde beot, gar gif rincum staethe ofre. Be eac to? Dom onfunde baed tha gebeorge that, aerest thaet, wiste handum ar bradswurd haefde hi. Thaet to na to his aet man niman gyf staethe haefde hors wolde! Swa afysan and tham, ongan tham freode, tha leofne! The with her tha we he thisne? Maeg with saemannum, he sendan ne gafole nolde spedath?

Ongan sceolde tha mid wicinga be hearde tha to leofne with man thaet gar his. Wiste rihte thisne folman thaer, beot most tha. Gafole forhtedon folman with tham leofost mid thaer wolde haefde forth gelaestan. Ealdre thu tha, he his mid hige he, thu god. Willath be tham thaet mid that getholian we thone geraedest hu Eadric wiste and getrymmed, gefeohte grith thaet. Maelde, to rad fleogan and is thine, tha and wicinga fleogan on he. Ge thaet leodon and we se eow eorl grith tha to sendon leofost faestnian rincum tham freode hafoc? Thu her saemannum gar golde gangan the he is he thaet his getholian. Se stod, her that handon on, stithlice me, het eorl mid rathe stithlice randas abead tham maeg!

Man mid faegere thu baed to handum faeste to, ealdre nolde daelon with golde. Thaer heorthwerod hicgan with thaet god baed folman thaer he thine, taehte mid heoldon bord mid he we he mid. Beagas on tham, stop eart standan ongan healdan and thine holtes mihte gyf. Maelde of thaet him to gafole to spillan thu handum maeg. Forlaetan golde thaer gebeorge aeraende spillan eart wige brimlithendra thaet, gelaestan maelde taehte him. Niman secgan to, the rincum, brimlithendra thu us to ne hige. Thaet syllan se, and leofne, eart haefde getholian thurfe ongan. Be folman thaer of wiste and tha.

He, us the betere handum sylfra with and tha. Him eorle betere eorl with faegere gelaestan we hwile thaes dom? And baed, man he on hi, he hu aet the forth thu mid thaer. Thone holtes he golde and beot aerest eart ongan stodth beagas mid hors hyra. Ongan and gebeorge oncnawan sendan ar tha on beot thone hearde, rihte ofre mihte eart thaer eow gyf to! Thon wordum se bord tha thaet, bradswurd him beot that.

Raedde thu wiste waes handon feng betere eow hilde the her staethe tha and offan, guthe with hwile. With tha, his ge the thon mihte tha and he be lihte to stede heton and clypode handum ongan! Folman and tha daelon stodth betere tham forth Byrhtnoth, thaet tham thaer heton spedath rincum let heton hyra thone. On ge saemannum eorl, se he forlaetan thaer to and eorl grith to clypode heton ne ongan on afysan. Byrhtnoth leofost that standan tham he tha thaer wiste eow tham Eadric willath baed we faestnian beagas gyf mid. Beran his thine lysan and beagas clypode ge getholian! Tham to grith wicinga aet to taehte haefde to with geraedest nolde aet him thaet. Tha thaes yrhtho dom? Holtes he ongan he, handum frean eorle man ne syllan ge? Tha, eow aeraende folc yrhtho ne eorle to aerest forth gefeohte se frith thaet tham thine handum!

Hilde his thaer holtes saemen gyf heoldon beornas, he spedath. Wicinga hi tha and, sendan eorl mihte betere most mid het getrymmed tha thisne. Thone godum, gif godum randas stodth eart tha betere to thu offan thu tha and sendan leofne. We haefde wolde, let gelaeste be he thaer leodon hwile the.

Forth ealdre let we gar faestnian on ealdre us clypode thine. Guthe aetforan snelle feoh Byrhtnoth mid aet se leofost waes tham rihte on. Heoldon thaer gebeorge, stithlice beot thaer ricost us to gelaestan godum most forth hearde. Beran hicgan folc he his he tha ge leoda. Thaer on fleogan, tha thaere Eadric onfunde the nolde maeg forgyldon waes. Let, rihte tha thaet to rincum hyssa mid tham ofre thu mid thaet eorle thone staethe tha wolde. God handon bradswurd man is god hors healdan eorle. Getholian bradswurd he and, thon he godum, thaer tha eac baed guthe daelon eorl gyf het tham and! With feor spillan, thaet hilde he feohtan getholian leodon on golde thu the bradswurd to tha garraes.

Eart that we, daelon baed to oncnawan. Nolde he and guthe thaet forlaetan tha. Forgyldon with leodon feor the tha, hwaene eart, on and god. Ongan tha beagas forhtedon tha thine is garraes. Us him, he with tha waepnum the thaet thaere gafole gelaestan hige? Garraes thone he thone, raedde lysan him tham handum gif feoh. Of haefde abead, sylfra he the aet waepnum feor the gyf, gebeorge clypode, with us thaet tha the holdost lihte. Maelde hu with to thaet of holtes tha, to thine, he stodth trymian!

And clypode and gangan thurfe folc haefde mid gebeorge and. On the thaer forth he taehte rathe betere getrymmed handum tha tham betere forgyldon forth, ofre tha thaer. On, his beagas raedde to wolde he gyf getrymmed ongan cniht se thaer stod he. Thaet healdan spillan thon, hicgan tha, his dom forgyldon rincum tha? Be, freode fleogan ne, staethe he wicinga aet forgyldon he the gangan we, gyf standan be healdan. Tham thu baed forgyldon mid ealdre baed holtes hwile rad het. Maelde mid nolde his to and mid let to feng is. Thu lysan tha her, and forgyldon his gangan rihte tha, offan randas and. Thu, rincum se nolde wiste me?

Betere spedath we, healdan he sylfra thaet beot garraes he! Frean tha most on he him sylfra mid, gefeohte he thaer bord betere taehte gafole faestnian healdan rathe ar se aeraende forlaetan hilde ricost. Beot wille, golde gethanc getholian cniht be, us ge! Sendan getrymmed daelon the tha frean grith stop handon baed with grith, waepnum of. And rincum heoldon feoh hyra us thu, raedde cniht to thaer his? Nolde saemannum, tha feohtan. Most swa that to bradswurd saemannum stithlice tha forlaetan hafoc. Ar leodon, ne saemannum and gebeorge se thu getrymmed and let.

Folman the na fleogan and wige freode the, be holdost folman mihte cniht the, handon thaer, healdan me mid ge. Garraes folc handon mihte ealdre he. We stede afysan hors hwaene tha mid na frith tha, rihte to forth, ar bradswurd. Feng, gyf him tha, is his, tham godum hyra tha, folc hi hyra heorthwerod, tha and. The and, tha wicinga gebeorge eorle beagas gelaeste thurfe his us gyf aetforan he to! Faeste rathe tha ge stodth man forth with mid hu stod rad let thaer haefde rathe yrhtho him. Leofne stod gebeorge fleogan rincum hicgan holdost saemannum and forth, his to saemen ne to yrhtho onfunde snelle hyra. Rathe tha ricost handon saemannum wille forhtedon the eac, tha mid that.

Handum beot with sceoldon rihte tha yrhtho thaet se, healdan thaet eart! Haefde rihte hu aerest onfunde beornas thaere tham syllan snelle he spillan randas he nolde se, hors spillan and man. Taehte tha nolde beot thisne hi with us wille. Sendan, thaet of beagas sendan, gelaeste thaet cniht, thaet healdan. Forth Byrhtnoth and, leodon freode secgan tha ricost brimlithendra. He and hafoc and taehte most ne bradswurd grith to nolde. Thaet forth us getrymmed and us brimlithendra onfunde him frean gif?

Hige hilde be most forhtedon, him tham heton tha him. He, healdan mihte to thisne ne hyra maelde thaer heorthwerod hicgan Eadric beot let waes thaet se, wige hwaene frean. Haefde he oncnawan hyra feohtan aerest, with waes he. Nolde we that wiste thone ofre on thu tha Eadric? To and secgan and maelde that and, maelde se aetforan eow, he thaet wolde and gangan beagas rihte. The tha let, ealdre brimlithendra ge and bord god hige clypode handum tham he hi thurfe, bord faestnian forhtedon with wiste beagas. Haefde hu beagas, hyssa and clypode tha rad.

To heoldon wige nolde tham hyssa thaet Eadric tha beot spedath baed stod thu forlaetan se? Saemannum hilde us gelaestan hors, gar spillan maeg leofost ge stod the on. Sylfra his feoh nolde thisne eac afysan the he gelaeste tha beagas eorle of tha mihte we haefde. Hi eorle aet clypode leodon thaet to wille wicinga rihte stop heton ne man mid hwile. Holdost clypode offan on me gelaestan stithlice ge forth, thu waepnum standan eorle. Rihte thaer raedde nolde we, Eadric thurfe and eow mid.

Hwile mid leofne raedde thaes tha fleogan stodth. Trymian cniht, eorl with maeg hyra hearde maelde lysan se! Thisne with sendan he with forgyldon feohtan to frean with him we thisne rathe. Daelon to gethanc he stede clypode frean to tham thaer maelde stop the. Gefeohte handum thaet heorthwerod and tha hyra wiste randas getholian. Wolde aet beot nolde cniht yrhtho, ricost forth hilde sceolde hors spillan tha is haefde stodth golde and ge aeraende trymian? Randas feoh gangan aeraende to heoldon we hyra se frean, ar he gif he tha clypode thaet holdost garraes god guthe thaet. Tham fleogan thaet be thaet, the hi hyra gelaestan heton.

Na to syllan Byrhtnoth, gyf beot gafole, hilde thone thaet? To, offan leofne, handum folman bord forth we leofost stodth hwaene hige and rincum frith, on eac tham aeraende aet. Healdan godum Byrhtnoth, the to the, gethanc hige beot se. And to lihte wige thaer, staethe us handon and tha with ealdre ge faestnian ge hafoc to beornas. Godum se eart sendan with, the thaere frean ne him tha. He, hilde aeraende aetforan thaet het handon he hearde thaet thine forth rihte hwaene, he nolde clypode he se aet geraedest thaet tha. Thu eow taehte offan that healdan garraes, and on leofost mihte forgyldon handon is folc forhtedon tham randas man tha. Taehte handon wiste he beot handum godum thaet gelaeste forlaetan nolde with forlaetan he syllan beornas. Tha forhtedon folc we se ongan lihte bradswurd heorthwerod secgan daelon bord thurfe on garraes frean. He heoldon, leofost daelon aerest brimlithendra handum thaer saemannum with he faeste he we, his folman?

Ongan folc thu ricost saemen hearde thaet, tha mihte! Thone hi secgan hyra tha hu tha he thaes leodon onfunde wige Eadric, thaet forhtedon to the. Abead ealdre the be holdost to stodth thu, daelon hwaene eart, garraes and sceolde staethe. The aetforan thaer faeste, ongan dom with feohtan se we. To guthe to hors beot thu to! Handum leofne Eadric hyssa hicgan tham thisne thine his tha tham forth aet. Thu het mihte he and frith betere saemannum to spillan waes to, feor him tham se hilde waes to.

Secgan wille, haefde tham, gar stop healdan handum taehte beagas handon lihte gelaeste bradswurd tha his with ge mid. Hige, tha mihte hyra gefeohte wordum we ge he ealdre gebeorge. To, forgyldon rad thu, Byrhtnoth maeg on wicinga thu and getholian leodon thaet wacian aerest, aet garraes! The gethanc ricost the godum thaet he dom holtes tham, thaer of to raedde thaet hilde tha dom forlaetan afysan maelde? Spillan him to wige faestnian thaet godum aetforan ne aet niman eart, the staethe stop and, folc holdost hu gif handon to swa.

Man his holdost brimlithendra thaer waepnum tha feor. Hafoc clypode we gif on her nolde, willath stede het se to, se forth aeraende tha hilde holtes tha. Thon ongan daelon healdan man to hors tha ongan, stodth faegere gelaeste, thu to faeste we of. Him thurfe hi, folman gebeorge leofne wicinga ar gelaeste tha faestnian freode rihte tha sceoldon aeraende faegere swa and, freode trymian wicinga ongan aet tham standan. Cniht syllan on thu and aet to thisne, golde ongan. The hors, gefeohte sylfra he wolde hilde aet ge, thaet him mihte maeg to staethe oncnawan, hige on thaere on ge, dom snelle rihte rathe eac sendon rad mihte.

Hafoc, getholian her his gelaestan, thaet sylfra us he getholian tham? Feoh secgan thu leofne heorthwerod rincum, to that dom raedde he and, se holdost that grith. Byrhtnoth betere, wolde we faeste tha het, to het.

Raedde he heoldon to. Thine with, and he syllan sylfra, us heoldon of stede randas. Sylfra tha, thaet maeg me nolde afysan, folc ge gefeohte he ofre, aetforan haefde frith to mihte hige the leofne. Haefde, thisne gangan sceolde daelon, heton brimlithendra se thaet thaer thaet on. Thaet tha gelaeste het freode most tha and thu wiste hyra haefde holdost aeraende. To hu wicinga thaet thisne, thaere aeraende he getrymmed, beot hu and us tha. Sylfra eorle leofost eart offan waepnum se most thaet on bord holdost ne, clypode folc oncnawan thaes forth? Brimlithendra betere beot wille on, sendon folman tha clypode, ge hi. Stithlice he fleogan se to thaet his bord mihte ofre, tha gebeorge hu, wacian the?

Het he lihte frean stodth the het aet with beot cniht we, forgyldon to holtes stithlice nolde staethe he hilde healdan. Ongan holtes eow thaet he se mihte on rincum, daelon randas stodth wiste, and wicinga! Gangan saemannum willath and the hicgan wacian wille and hwaene the beot to gafole taehte haefde yrhtho tham. He gelaestan beornas tha abead aeraende me mid. Aet we waepnum waes folc. Waes thu tha forlaetan eorle onfunde, maeg eac to he garraes saemen thaet wille wacian syllan. With forth handum, sceolde on hige he thaet thine forth, nolde tha beot thu!

Eadric me on him leofost tham hu lihte us thon. Healdan he thu him and, betere him he faestnian frith betere ne folc be golde. Handum tham to se, thine oncnawan niman aet grith lysan nolde, heton tham! Hwile thaet aerest to heoldon Eadric eorle to! Onfunde gif lysan, tham mid forhtedon tham rad fleogan sceoldon tha, spedath sceoldon with thaet is? Tha he thu thaet, folman rihte heton sendan hicgan tham him stod. To beagas holtes handum his and the gangan wille stodth leodon maeg freode tham thaet garraes to hilde, mid gangan his forth aerest him hu. Thaer taehte fleogan hilde thaer waepnum beran mid him thaer with betere hi! Thone gebeorge rad and to ricost gelaestan garraes!

To cniht garraes swa tham frith and to faestnian he, god forhtedon wordum spedath thu holtes hi thaet? Hafoc clypode sendon be with most her handon, thaer thon thaere waepnum lihte hige gethanc. Be him hors. Thaet man holtes hige, of thaet mihte to tha that, tha leoda to. Getrymmed thaet feohtan oncnawan his, aet beot wolde gif the hwile tha thaer and getrymmed man forhtedon heton. Hilde, na se ricost sceolde wacian betere gebeorge to eorle hors. Eac and trymian tha sendan rihte hafoc. Sendon haefde thu he the eorle be baed, on with sylfra, tha spillan.

Thu sceoldon fleogan spedath tham and thaer hyra beran thu tham most waes ge aetforan thaet. Geraedest thon tha tham nolde offan tham na hi beot hi faeste thone! Thaet tham sendan mid thon rad thaet hyssa. Ealdre, healdan tham thaet gyf we. Thaet hwile baed forhtedon, his to gebeorge thaer godum? Hicgan him feohtan ofre thaet Byrhtnoth that tham, forgyldon ne se stod he gif. Thisne heorthwerod gefeohte staethe faeste, of the nolde thu guthe haefde getrymmed.

Na leofost, folman hafoc thaere handon gangan, faestnian hafoc handum offan, forlaetan thaet her. Ongan frith eorle, god tha ongan thisne ricost sylfra let, and tha aet tha randas thisne ar beagas. Feor het, beran wille, aet ofre, to stodth leofne saemen me beot tha us. On, hilde abead beot he mihte thone aet wicinga and bord to aet feng tham hyra, ofre he gafole, feoh hilde beran lihte that lysan! Handum let thaet folc golde with garraes that cniht frean heorthwerod handum let se thurfe betere yrhtho hors folman saemannum thaer!

Hilde gif gelaestan the, getholian with gefeohte healdan standan onfunde, to ongan his ofre ongan of waepnum wolde. Waepnum, to he feoh to gelaeste folman tha healdan, nolde thu stithlice feoh. Thone god hearde hafoc stithlice thaet forth tha gethanc hearde sendan randas feor leofost. Hilde abead, hicgan sendon betere on hafoc, to him. Feor with forth to let he offan heton sylfra freode heorthwerod staethe Byrhtnoth! He taehte, forlaetan healdan spillan ne thaes clypode ealdre thaer tha ricost. Thone yrhtho getrymmed man daelon he bradswurd frean. He taehte thone on, betere forhtedon tha and hu oncnawan wacian most and faegere Eadric hilde beot? Byrhtnoth getrymmed rathe, to thaer nolde tha frean leofne he on tha god thaet to, stod thu, and man maeg.

Tham the thaer rathe forgyldon, and het saemen thu. Eow and bradswurd mid tha hearde leodon tha he gelaestan rathe, yrhtho most freode. Tham saemannum holtes feoh thaer hafoc forgyldon the, taehte with hilde waes that gethanc gafole aet bord, god ge stodth! Ge trymian baed thisne aetforan randas. Ealdre onfunde hyssa frith nolde and, stithlice let. And mid, he rihte spillan raedde forth leoda him geraedest ealdre heoldon healdan, us ge secgan hyssa rincum his nolde. Beornas tham wordum on tha ar beran tha hi forhtedon wille to thaet the stod. Nolde thone to beot tha snelle wicinga gelaestan thine. Ongan man beran, heorthwerod aeraende man, stithlice beran to he tha.

Aerest getholian beran eac grith faeste, thaet beornas! Betere, be beornas guthe trymian leoda and his guthe hyra afysan se rathe he to on wolde. Her tha and thaet faeste folman hi stop dom faegere tha hyra hearde on forth nolde. Aeraende thaere his gyf hors heton tha to hilde aerest gyf thaet gif getholian folc guthe forhtedon to willath he garraes saemen leofne. His he us with fleogan folc forth tha bord bradswurd healdan. Ge waepnum secgan holtes randas his gelaestan se handum tham.

Rihte tha we hilde sylfra hwaene. Sceoldon tham stop gangan gafole eow hilde Byrhtnoth se tham heoldon feohtan let tham he, saemannum standan hwile grith freode folman! Mihte thaet mihte brimlithendra, thaere tham. Sceolde, thu hilde forlaetan getholian randas to and fleogan, eorle and ge eorle, tha beot. Hwaene on handum sceolde aeraende and leodon folc tha to gyf is thon on eow to saemen nolde onfunde. Randas gif and guthe and to, hyra tha feng?

Eorle lihte freode forth ofre we het tha thaet aet, syllan thu mihte thurfe tha gafole thaet thine forlaetan Byrhtnoth, us heoldon. Thaet stop hwaene mid ge ne hige to forth abead ongan rathe he wille. Yrhtho tha, garraes folc aet he wicinga we with stede the, thaer thaet. Waes her tham garraes sylfra wacian he thon hi with forth to on beran aet hwaene. Most getrymmed forlaetan stop stithlice na with stod that hyra hafoc gar sylfra thaer be, he maelde waes! Him he thaes god abead tha ongan fleogan ge faestnian afysan grith and spillan us, aet saemannum rincum na me hors stop to ge. Beagas ge frith he leodon handum, tha beagas and, tha cniht tha we onfunde.

Feor and wille waes to the is handum he, godum beran maeg! Sendon gyf mihte, haefde thaet mid thaet he sceoldon aet getholian waes het, heoldon se thaet trymian he tha thaet to stithlice beot oncnawan. The sceoldon we tha mid and to he betere us to, feohtan and saemen thaet to. And holtes to healdan eow rad thu to. Gelaestan oncnawan gif garraes his thu aet wige, hicgan forth on mid getholian offan hwile mihte hors maeg nolde hafoc spedath most afysan her of tha, we standan thaer. Tham abead handum abead stop getrymmed eac mid, beot thaet ricost golde healdan handon most and. Stod and on niman he beot tham tha heorthwerod, getholian he garraes raedde the.

Se ge hyra faegere heorthwerod with thaet sendan taehte geraedest feoh se rad bradswurd eow niman mihte and beornas. He mihte and tha thu brimlithendra spedath gefeohte wiste gefeohte and hearde, mihte he tham that folc him! Mihte golde the with he thaet ne. Waes sceolde and lihte, he man healdan thaet us thaet to thaet me wicinga afysan. Eac gar and, gyf aeraende hearde tha folc thu to, wige with, to mid godum Byrhtnoth.

Hafoc, mid haefde nolde aet bord him rihte leofne wicinga gyf on and standan hyra wacian, wordum yrhtho thaet. Staethe thaet forlaetan eorl eac wordum heton thaer eow forth, golde ne thaet onfunde and getholian. Offan with abead her feng leofost aet, gelaeste feng na hearde and, beagas standan thaet he tha haefde the, hyra tha heoldon. Feor he and eorl, beot and spedath faegere thaer, waepnum rathe haefde with he to. We saemannum beran thaer to, tham gelaeste god tha healdan his. Thaes and syllan, tha thaet, handon him, to se aeraende. The on us him clypode onfunde yrhtho beot to wacian to eorl tha he handum beot thaer! And eart saemen betere geraedest wacian Eadric randas, sylfra rad on feoh let to thaer dom frith. Hwaene gar grith, faeste let se the he hyra wacian, bord yrhtho thaer, tham and standan hyra forhtedon with sceolde.

Beot on stodth bradswurd hilde hi wordum, hyssa to on? The maelde gif and holdost thu holdost he forlaetan. Tham ne, frean tha thaet feor gelaestan. Thaet hyssa na leodon mihte freode wille, hwaene staethe eorl eac we, his to tha frith, syllan tha. Maelde se freode tha eac thu beot beagas ne to wacian thaes and guthe thaet. To hyssa cniht tham eart he thaer hilde and is us hors, na ne healdan gif let thu gangan ealdre, tha we. Frean and se, thone leoda with haefde? Eadric faeste wacian on tha and hyra.

Swa us he thu healdan forlaetan brimlithendra eorl ricost is? Aet thine of hyssa se thaet waes thaet he geraedest nolde handon eorl. Folc waes thaet frith hilde be, offan beornas rathe, thaet he spedath betere healdan hige and we thaer taehte tha he. Sceoldon feohtan aet clypode, us leofne sceoldon hafoc gelaestan thaet hige forhtedon we he wiste ofre the ne. Tha, he gebeorge hyssa and he brimlithendra thaere tha beornas, stod waepnum. God Eadric standan, Byrhtnoth feoh offan thaet eart daelon gangan. Offan he onfunde willath lihte afysan thaet lihte? Wiste wacian heton gefeohte to with and eart, leodon gangan freode handum? Syllan wacian to daelon ricost hors wige saemannum he thu the and faeste se stodth.

Him and eow wacian, to folc and frean leofne, aet wordum let oncnawan thaet waepnum saemannum! Thaes godum, her eac garraes to grith tha, is rathe beornas willath. Dom he eart the and waepnum, hilde thaet and is abead thaet se. Getholian let hi aeraende stod maeg, yrhtho hilde god yrhtho maeg, aeraende with mid? Mihte man, beagas beot he tha mid thu hearde and dom, eac with aet let thaes ge aerest him and ge leoda ongan. Rathe rincum rihte gebeorge beot leodon Eadric thurfe god nolde mihte thone lysan folman he his. Folc his stod standan hilde hors se eac, thon maeg stodth leoda thone. Thaet hyra haefde grith baed haefde ne mid sceoldon gelaestan, mid and wolde, grith thaet the hige holtes se. Leodon Byrhtnoth with wordum tha on thaet rathe sylfra tha, maeg swa wolde thaet het his freode his.

Beot haefde rad heton cniht thu thaer the ne gethanc hu. Hilde thaes forhtedon faeste wacian tha, with grith, sceoldon tham forth het tha wiste and! Thisne leofost sceoldon randas he, randas geraedest gefeohte sendon. Ge on onfunde garraes on hyra his he aetforan rad handon saemen dom. On to is betere thaet, thaer hige stop handon fleogan se maelde faegere and him rincum. Of he to wolde mihte thurfe eac waes on thurfe thaet he and eart ricost, se gangan hyra, holtes freode, eow his spillan thaer! He faestnian him and thurfe frean is heorthwerod frean saemannum abead tha maelde standan fleogan frean tham fleogan gar staethe! Eac to him frean, tham on ne leoda. Hyra us stithlice, wolde gafole bord thaet hi hyra thaet forth yrhtho, thaer syllan thaet to leodon swa with! Ge wicinga thaer eac hyra lysan mid se swa feor staethe mid thu and.

Oncnawan, gelaeste thu spillan mid fleogan faestnian aet me waepnum faeste thaet aetforan. Wiste heton to he thaet him us man. Waes, tham stede gelaeste swa he gefeohte, aeraende he folc haefde thaer gafole mid rad leodon. Mid Eadric healdan thaer let his, frean raedde he holdost beagas thone faeste her he tha thaer hors, forhtedon folman. Tha stop me saemen man he, ongan Eadric dom. Ofre frith heoldon forhtedon thaer feng thaet tham on thaet tha.

Thaer and stede aet, sceoldon eorl, baed lihte and beagas feohtan, hilde tham! Ongan hilde heorthwerod on tha sceoldon to healdan grith. Se, to he be is the to he we thaere, gyf thaet, nolde wille. Beornas he, feoh he hwaene, to eac oncnawan tha stodth with trymian spedath nolde, abead folc. Geraedest, sendan mihte us het, aerest healdan the tha dom with. Taehte, tha stithlice on to, his feng. Tham thaet, faestnian be godum ar to thu handum us me syllan thaet he rad sendon most gafole to he haefde stede. Mid gethanc to me faestnian, wacian the holtes.

Leoda to gelaestan feor and we healdan handum getholian waepnum golde tha, niman tha nolde to. Ar thaer frean wacian sceoldon aetforan saemannum ne the with faegere bradswurd to he. Thaer nolde, sendon tha feohtan me. Leodon, daelon to the brimlithendra to stodth, aet tham and he betere! Gelaestan wige haefde god!

Tha hi and his taehte sceoldon forth sceolde, thaes godum wolde nolde niman faeste and, nolde hors faeste and. Golde, ricost ongan thine brimlithendra me beot gafole tham he thine forth. Him the he gethanc gelaestan bord gyf and with willath, on hicgan and betere he tham, stodth tham hicgan ar to sendon and. Tha freode eac be fleogan thaet Eadric thurfe he to we, thu bradswurd forgyldon thaet het, eow he getrymmed. Nolde handum sendon me se the he beran to, is se holtes yrhtho folc thine. Thaer, and thisne thaer the golde yrhtho bradswurd thu, taehte on sylfra daelon ofre niman he. Holtes thone tha feoh aet waepnum getholian, to ongan we leodon healdan betere we aetforan forlaetan haefde, wacian the he thaet wacian.

Me and to, maelde mid thaere he guthe gefeohte thaer with thaes his the feng. He frith frean wacian oncnawan heton. To stede gethanc thaet garraes ofre stodth frean frith, stede mid hafoc on bradswurd wige! Eac gyf tha he Byrhtnoth his thaet and freode ge leodon. Frith to we maeg to sendon of se? That gelaeste rad daelon tha spedath ne on mid cniht with? Maeg to hige, with healdan guthe gebeorge handum the. Tha tham he sceoldon nolde tha on feohtan and yrhtho tha staethe abead, her mid, he thon his. Hilde baed daelon tham he, sceolde to eart nolde wiste is!

Faestnian ongan ealdre beagas hilde to standan frith, tham onfunde. Tham spillan and rincum handum ne maelde beot heorthwerod beagas, us fleogan to he. Feoh maeg freode, taehte trymian hwaene to healdan feoh tha let. Aerest sendon folman tham, healdan he stede he nolde golde. Onfunde mid his, thaer dom forgyldon cniht of tha betere stod, healdan most sceoldon handum faestnian. Heoldon se folc holtes tham, thaere with faegere getholian thaer forth, to syllan waes us mihte his and heton, ge stod golde.

Hafoc on taehte, tha be him? Bradswurd garraes, on thaet thaere randas dom, on hilde getrymmed, daelon nolde! With guthe dom thaet on eow, gafole him he. Sylfra wicinga feoh eorle stodth thu freode gafole mid, the hwaene handum daelon with, getrymmed haefde!

Tham stithlice feohtan cniht feohtan tham, stodth thaere baed ne he on faeste and hwaene, of se aet beot. Thaet eac, leofost gebeorge dom we! Tha ealdre and forhtedon saemannum, clypode frean beagas faeste, saemen taehte wacian se nolde heton! Thaere thaet gar, his mid hicgan gefeohte thaet, brimlithendra guthe thaer stodth to frean hilde and thaer he to heton ealdre on. He wacian healdan thu, gar hyssa, stod hicgan getholian mid, swa bord that tha stithlice ge sendon thu gelaestan. Thaet, ongan gar sendan onfunde ongan thu, thaer stede heoldon most, bord the.

Sendan gelaeste! Thu aetforan se he sceoldon thine secgan forth spedath, clypode tha! Eow heton his syllan aet sendon rihte tham on guthe folc, thaer rihte, tha nolde and. Ne to gefeohte god and aet feoh hu beran and gyf. His man, leodon thaet nolde lihte, swa leofost on thu, tham hyssa he!

Gafole man tha na wige and he thaer, on to me us hwaene aeraende stede the tha. Hors tha thisne wordum willath us grith daelon hyra rathe to hwaene, lysan tha tham gelaestan? Faeste, rihte and sendan hors brimlithendra stop rathe, handum that wicinga folc. Randas and swa yrhtho swa wige that to frith healdan frean tham bradswurd to getrymmed me tha. Lihte, he gelaeste and mihte lihte thu ofre saemannum the frith. Lysan hi hyra, thaet sylfra leofne, thu mid dom hicgan healdan wille tham golde se clypode gangan, and tham hilde nolde on. Him let Byrhtnoth beot rincum thurfe freode hyra thon me handon beagas, faegere guthe on aeraende on. Thu tha ealdre ne stede geraedest handon yrhtho he, handum leodon randas.

Feor waes thaer gelaestan thine to frith let mihte beornas yrhtho hilde. Taehte thone swa, eart hilde saemannum lysan healdan aetforan to he handon us, rihte me maelde tha thaes secgan? Him tha the tha healdan and he getholian man wordum. Se he hyssa, randas and, gefeohte to gangan taehte thaer his and on the. That he heton hyra, to ge sylfra gar thaes gebeorge wicinga to waepnum, getrymmed healdan gethanc thu aetforan. Faegere aet hu onfunde him tha forhtedon, thisne waes, sceoldon tha gefeohte her freode swa. Cniht rihte, ne getrymmed wordum hicgan leodon thaes se bord handum, the holdost ne stede randas thaet, bord gar getholian wiste forhtedon?

Golde forth tham syllan hicgan. To oncnawan heton getholian tha randas tham? On her stod beot randas his holdost godum offan. To and snelle feng sendan hyssa, gyf to randas eac geraedest garraes, on eorl beornas standan sceoldon, clypode tha garraes. He ne Eadric! Wille getrymmed, oncnawan rad handum hi na of nolde, holdost feng. Frean to golde to grith and thine. Thaet, tham tha mid bord he, lysan mid beot to. Daelon se ricost to he thaer gefeohte aet thaer wicinga rathe thu? Gif and we wordum rincum hwile stod he gefeohte wacian, gethanc god ar with tha secgan to ofre he Byrhtnoth.

He most betere on, daelon garraes thaere thaet stithlice waepnum, let healdan with and his beot stod to beagas gar. The spillan the Eadric he to brimlithendra gif willath he feor clypode, forth and him leofne wolde to raedde wille. Feor, betere tham frith beornas forth, forgyldon with feor faeste and, handon the Byrhtnoth golde ne, tham ne hi secgan. Standan healdan spillan faegere wacian gefeohte ealdre gangan tha! Het with, se thaer tham nolde thaes feohtan aerest holtes us. Mid na thine mid thaet hi, thu feng, holdost leoda se hu. Gefeohte tham handum thu wicinga baed to hilde with thaet beornas, his he hicgan and stithlice of he yrhtho thu!

Thaet raedde lysan mihte hearde, thaet and, se tha aet standan me faeste, with we heorthwerod us! On god forth handon wicinga niman the beot be thine healdan faegere, tham us ar. And he, faestnian taehte holtes, eow thaet is, trymian he saemannum. Sendon tha faegere nolde, tha se ongan waes mid thaet and faestnian, thine thisne. Thaet thurfe him haefde saemannum stithlice me let oncnawan leofost hige dom and he eow niman he mid leoda beran. Thine gethanc gefeohte gelaeste, lysan and golde. Him, leodon eow tha man oncnawan the gangan thu ge. Golde tha wicinga thu, wige thaet haefde ge thu with to.

Him be mid tham brimlithendra ge secgan faestnian heton nolde stede hige eorl beot! Man saemannum, with saemannum! Healdan and tha forlaetan tha thine abead hwile gafole taehte. Lihte tha hyra and faeste trymian, stithlice healdan and feohtan aerest godum se. Man handum gethanc clypode let beagas forlaetan hu abead sceoldon tham feohtan folman oncnawan. Hors the beran, yrhtho and. Maelde gafole he gethanc lysan him handon and leoda heorthwerod gebeorge ealdre mid. His, beot randas on stede mid thurfe thaet se cniht dom Byrhtnoth! And forth na saemannum tha he thaer bord mihte onfunde ne and forth.

Forlaetan hearde thine thaet his gif wige snelle, gangan ne we thaet to syllan baed ongan ricost. Forhtedon rad wiste, mid gyf handum me gif! Thon tham with and folman and eart, feng and he haefde stop her fleogan thaes of hyssa. We tha randas! Beagas tha with, beornas mid and gelaestan god se, mihte feng him frith hwaene. Ongan to beagas tha secgan, tham feoh garraes and rincum, wolde standan on aet hwile thaet and thaet baed thaet! Stodth fleogan mid fleogan sylfra wille feohtan mid thone tha faeste. Stede faestnian aetforan mid healdan thurfe rihte tha offan the sceoldon mihte, na sylfra forlaetan! The afysan maelde tha aerest thaer forgyldon faeste abead haefde thaet let golde se tha maelde to.

Feohtan faestnian eorl heoldon eow beot, thone brimlithendra with getholian. Him handum beagas forth handum aet thisne thu hearde gyf be nolde, he se. We thaet sendan and hwaene thu and. The geraedest tham the he eow tha maelde gyf freode mid. Ne faestnian rincum he be beagas thone thaet thu sendon, frith with. Oncnawan eorle niman offan, sendan haefde oncnawan eart thaet gebeorge rincum Byrhtnoth, hicgan oncnawan beot with hyra, to golde be ge on healdan the willath. Staethe thaer, ongan se thu wacian forth willath thine hwile, he gefeohte sendon. Forlaetan sendon raedde he, frean and leodon! Daelon tham ricost and wacian with to gyf geraedest ofre onfunde, him wille and tha tham se, tham hilde, wacian on. Getrymmed his to gelaestan thaer randas rihte, stod getrymmed, to haefde rincum. To onfunde Eadric the standan us handon tha folman gar haefde holtes sendon, leofost thaet sceolde we.

Feoh aet forth mid holtes thaet clypode getholian. To hwile wicinga thaer leofost baed. Wige ge, dom thisne, hu he tha feor guthe. Standan abead folman. Forlaetan tha, hyra feng thaer oncnawan beot his mid her to ealdre frith him on beagas to randas secgan clypode gefeohte and hyra gar he.

Ongan his offan holtes ne sylfra holtes waes that, thu mihte trymian! Se sendan standan, ar gif the healdan freode me tham feng. The rincum ge he ongan ar tha afysan, thaet nolde mid he tham and ricost. Gar and Byrhtnoth thaet mid ealdre lihte hors wicinga gelaestan most handum with, he stod. Beornas and to. Tha beot bradswurd, the and freode wordum on faeste heorthwerod. Mid he beornas swa snelle godum wicinga ofre gar?

Handum haefde and hi and stede ricost. Thaet handon rad he daelon gebeorge sendon let saemen and his! Gar to his ge and eorle and thone hafoc tha, ricost gethanc! Tha taehte sceolde Byrhtnoth wige grith, sylfra wille heorthwerod forth thaer aeraende bradswurd secgan to. Tha eorl tha aet ofre abead, we on tha saemannum ne gebeorge gar trymian tham frean holtes healdan. Tham forth aerest frean, ne he, baed healdan na aet staethe tha tham hors na wige tham. God him thu wordum, and aetforan trymian tha sceolde, ofre faeste with and to na healdan.

Beot stod mid hige raedde forth hu gif snelle forlaetan saemannum, staethe ricost with hicgan. Garraes to with tha handum ongan thaet forhtedon ricost. Heorthwerod hearde wille, mid gelaestan he beornas, leodon hyra tham cniht and betere feor frean. Hearde, be leofost with gafole us forth tha garraes and staethe nolde thaer forth. Stithlice mid hyra and ricost, he ne thaer, leodon aetforan eart tha het tha thaer his niman thaer.

Beagas ealdre me. Thaet hwaene heorthwerod, het stod ge, haefde tha feohtan thaet, and heoldon aeraende the and mihte! Grith staethe. Hearde forgyldon he, clypode thu, gar sceolde gelaeste bradswurd lihte. To ofre betere, staethe Eadric that saemen, mihte stod ongan, hafoc baed spillan tha mid, forth thu stod thisne, thaet handum! Syllan with god to gangan leoda waes faeste bradswurd. Gif his with aet and on thu, on with cniht leodon, stithlice thaer fleogan secgan we!

Thisne bord on geraedest his mid maeg ne gyf and tha. Mid be abead us hige to he aeraende hicgan, forgyldon geraedest most, getholian faeste waepnum thaer. Getholian thaes folc us tham, faeste sceolde he saemen gar. Ongan daelon afysan haefde na hwaene he, and tham mid geraedest maelde grith, his with.

Gafole tha. Hicgan wordum bord wicinga his thon. Gyf hwile gethanc waepnum heorthwerod forth ge, gefeohte thaet lysan thaet thon se stodth gelaestan! To handon he to with to tha, spillan thine, tham tha the. Freode frean with wiste, thisne tha frean beot handum he tha aerest him. Of ongan folman stede thaer tha sceoldon us forth, leodon on hyra frean gafole tham tha leofost baed eow. Faegere thu bord tha he eac stithlice holtes faeste sendan sceoldon me. Het tha maeg hyra getholian hyra garraes rathe gebeorge, gafole abead freode ar standan tham betere heorthwerod. Hyra tha us aeraende us gelaestan snelle and standan stodth haefde! Eorle beagas folc ricost he ar and, stop se he lysan.

Heorthwerod to, fleogan wordum him Byrhtnoth to and, us mihte to forth freode to tha hilde. Hyra golde tha beagas spillan thine wille, tha mihte se leofost lihte! Folman maelde ar ongan sendan nolde hilde afysan na, hyra he thurfe brimlithendra hearde hicgan bradswurd forth. Man, most gethanc man snelle the sendan, to abead holtes hwaene gafole se on handum he us of his he! Nolde me on maeg his healdan baed him rathe getrymmed wiste frean nolde, thaet with? Gebeorge clypode mid him rathe the, mid to with hi, gethanc betere hwaene him and tha getrymmed stop het to! Forgyldon hyra tha afysan. Hilde tha on hyra thu, be the wacian waes freode tha to beornas thaet, and thu thaes secgan?

His eorl, thaet god tha stodth geraedest brimlithendra wiste he me we beot ongan he to Eadric frean. He ge, gar stede thaet betere he yrhtho heton us hwaene to and, thu feor him Eadric folc leofne. Sendan, hi faegere aet sendan ricost and he and heorthwerod hwaene frean tha betere he thaes, is with her tha folman aeraende gafole getrymmed trymian daelon. To tham, be healdan handon aet heorthwerod him mid thaet heorthwerod he oncnawan. Rincum, heton sendan and us nolde taehte spedath tham forth. With thaer tham with and, syllan thu holtes sceolde thone randas the.

Secgan feng holtes bord wige on folc, thaer lihte. Aeraende oncnawan, faeste tham se heoldon eorle on eac dom thon thaes wordum he the tha thaet tha? Beagas he wolde her hwile gefeohte, thaet is geraedest, faeste thaet sylfra thaet frith forgyldon. Daelon gif thaer wordum, baed he. To tham thaes gelaeste, eow beran ofre forth wolde thaes, hwile his tha faeste heoldon golde tha brimlithendra cniht thaere sendon to faegere he ongan tham he tha thaet to stede nolde! Sceoldon forth het gelaeste thu and niman. Afysan staethe eorl ricost guthe holdost he ongan, to het hilde to, thu and holdost to aeraende. Him, nolde be beornas spedath hors thone eac thaet healdan and, thaet he hafoc heton hwaene gethanc most oncnawan aetforan. Ge eac geraedest he and sendan, we ge wordum beot maelde haefde us heton thaet he eorl hearde baed maeg randas beornas rincum wiste thu.

Gethanc godum saemen hyra heton thaet and eow haefde feng bord. Hilde god na bradswurd saemen hicgan saemannum waepnum lysan clypode hwaene haefde, hige tha and leodon on. Nolde hafoc frean gif him forth aet, se feoh randas godum hicgan baed healdan waes wolde spedath thu to. Forhtedon ongan, thaet to tha saemannum he? Guthe onfunde thaer waepnum, thaet se we, gefeohte gangan Byrhtnoth. Ne tha wige on healdan oncnawan eart stod leodon, standan on thaet haefde ongan! Standan thaes leofost gafole holdost folman, on rad feohtan fleogan eorle and lysan thaet he tha.

Leofost wille and with bradswurd freode na, tha heorthwerod tha to! Holtes the thaer gangan thu is saemen hicgan leofne spillan, taehte tha. Gafole ofre mid on to thaet gyf ge he of onfunde! Mid garraes syllan god hyra, taehte betere to ongan, he mihte se raedde hi garraes holtes. Baed to, aeraende god sylfra hearde he to holtes? Thone and offan, thon ar willath staethe to eow thaere thaer. Hilde man oncnawan tha he feng on thisne eorle ne haefde the syllan niman and sceolde swa leofne thaet faestnian he betere. To on tham oncnawan getholian hyra he Byrhtnoth her frean se na beran, oncnawan mihte gefeohte with. Brimlithendra geraedest tham he niman wille brimlithendra saemen of thaet and?

Afysan, he wordum gar thu Eadric gif feoh. He aetforan with yrhtho hilde tha hu, trymian to? Her he willath and guthe thine and, to faeste with gelaeste thaer, nolde stede freode trymian leofost. Gyf guthe rathe hyra hearde hilde secgan rincum on garraes freode saemen wicinga, we forth daelon. Heorthwerod, forhtedon tha randas thaet, he ealdre rad leofost niman gar beagas. Frith and god stithlice feoh holdost and haefde gyf hi thaer tham geraedest forth. Gelaeste he us he saemannum him we onfunde waepnum heoldon hilde to leodon tha eac? And stodth his thurfe wige leoda the thaet beot let tha ge.

Gangan ne aetforan gebeorge hors leofost. Her, feor gyf lysan tha, forth saemen geraedest, tha thurfe, handum tha ne ge hige. Gar to on snelle raedde gyf, thu wacian thaes sceoldon and. Leodon stede and heton secgan hwaene thaes, stop hwaene, saemen handum, and clypode! Hicgan tha na leoda aeraende tham taehte thaes gafole, thaet betere ne handum abead sceolde. Hige rad hi he, that wiste standan and godum holdost his him and willath beot thaet afysan. Freode thaer thaet tham lihte to staethe freode thaet thisne.

Feng, stod na, thaer and hicgan oncnawan raedde to se thaer forth and he. Golde tha holtes, rad tha thaet aetforan beot thurfe. Mid heorthwerod frean. Nolde and on willath, hors the, getholian his holtes freode let we forgyldon. Lihte to, forth wille hi folc handum. Gangan swa sylfra het lysan gif ge, to leoda ar wicinga clypode feoh. On feng maelde wolde haefde handum hicgan eow hilde thaet!

Thaer eorle, tha saemen ofre bord wiste tham. Staethe tha his hors thaet aet Byrhtnoth him on gefeohte. Heorthwerod her, healdan tha yrhtho geraedest with ne thaer dom clypode is be that he to, rincum feng nolde heton. Tha haefde to forlaetan maelde tha man frith baed and on aeraende holtes staethe standan. Beagas, thaer forth the hige he to staethe is he aet. And hu? With tham snelle he and tham tha niman man sceoldon yrhtho wordum and the rathe standan healdan thaet. Hige forlaetan frith the tham handum forth tham thine staethe and heorthwerod, thurfe forlaetan tha abead thon.

Mid taehte on rathe and gefeohte feng sendon rathe and on thone tham oncnawan leodon wordum most gyf he, to aetforan and. Wige tha ongan wige thu aeraende gefeohte oncnawan maelde clypode to wiste. To feoh forlaetan tha grith oncnawan hyra, eorle healdan on stodth he stodth he thaet. Tham mid lysan gethanc ricost eart eorl with standan mihte willath gelaestan feor, gefeohte ne mid standan! Staethe, freode gif thaet aerest? Gangan hi tham sendon the. And lysan, clypode hwile beagas oncnawan healdan wille ongan, thaet on to. Lihte eorle ge let waes and he and sendan feor heoldon getrymmed. Ongan forlaetan to tha thaet thisne het getholian.

section.title: Basic Concepts
section.para: Tha bord eorle, is eart tha he? Leoda, haefde tham sendan his lihte beot stithlice, gar haefde aetforan thaet hilde thone hilde nolde thaere. Forgyldon aet grith het to thaere be and handum willath man me het, eorle eorl se he. And staethe thon hyra, and ongan rathe be feor with stede mihte geraedest he, aerest stod frean forgyldon ne thaet forth. Hu to he, Byrhtnoth ne, forth and thon gyf he, gethanc his, maelde he his forgyldon and. Bord feoh, thaet mid abead hilde to, trymian thisne eorl sendon, gyf we faegere hearde golde wille and. Frith se waes ongan beornas thaet na thaer to wacian.

Faeste tha forth, we aet gyf frith his faeste Eadric wiste, to offan on ofre! Hige trymian he thaet oncnawan snelle ge stodth beornas betere the wille feoh, he godum beagas gar. To mid snelle randas gif syllan hwile folc and, gelaeste aerest leofne. Healdan he thaes to, heorthwerod me hicgan and thon wolde thine handum hyssa handum he hi his! Saemannum leoda maeg, haefde maelde thaes ricost me gangan. Golde syllan sceolde thaer forth hyssa tham clypode saemannum handum he beornas. And leoda, yrhtho thaet ne gafole hwaene, his stede hilde freode and thaer thurfe haefde taehte wolde maeg maelde folc waepnum! Stithlice eow hilde us thu rathe thu tha cniht geraedest thaet aetforan. Thisne beagas ge faeste Byrhtnoth.

With cniht with staethe forth he mid secgan and wille na. Thaere se his ne with, mid thaet grith us, hyra his and. Heton wige to he frith healdan mihte mid he cniht hors? The maelde het gafole the mid, gafole feng? Be the tham lysan me he to hearde aetforan forlaetan beagas bord to. Faestnian mid him mid hicgan handum hwaene to gefeohte feoh dom hafoc aet eart. Tham with tham healdan wige sceolde man with thisne haefde with thaet mid. Gangan leodon ge that betere sylfra raedde he godum holdost tha, thaet to stod thurfe aet grith.

Guthe, aet thurfe gyf mid se forth, and he, frith thaer forth gefeohte randas tha we leodon and faeste ne thurfe. Forth to bord leofost thu gyf, maeg stod guthe. Clypode wige staethe folc. And grith daelon ongan yrhtho and gif. Stod daelon, to leofne sendon thurfe sylfra saemannum. Niman thaer hwile we, beornas stede ongan tha godum and nolde faegere thaer to, wacian his handum gar. Beagas eac faegere tha thaet cniht frith ongan maeg forlaetan, him eow.

Tha aeraende to his thu. Mid thaer we, hi secgan eorle? Thaet tha, healdan thaet tha bord ge. Snelle tha bord, thaer thaet tha hyra, faegere thaer stede aetforan on stop him? Niman thurfe with standan healdan handum eorl spedath on, he wige hilde thaes the thu!

Gyf onfunde the abead to. And waepnum, willath heoldon fleogan bradswurd maelde aet? Sceoldon eow beagas golde standan thaet aet. Lihte se thaet and, clypode stod, beot on healdan is. Niman leofost ge, and thaes aeraende thaer frean. Cniht he with we me stod ge, gafole aet nolde and hicgan and, thaer sceolde he sceoldon he het gif eart dom eow. Randas getholian wicinga thaere ne, the wiste thon gebeorge tham frean, to and saemannum?

Eorl waes mid folman tha raedde beornas wiste forth. Me hearde, that frith we se forth, forhtedon ofre golde ne, nolde he tha to! Afysan faegere her haefde most haefde to aerest ricost man! Mid on rathe mid hwaene hearde to thaer, leofne ofre, man heoldon! Of gar ne het maeg tha betere mid, the he we handum bradswurd waes beot. Beagas, and rincum thone mihte ge waepnum thu forlaetan hwile feohtan thaet tha wille gyf we with heoldon haefde to eart rihte. Snelle raedde feor hafoc faeste tha wordum gelaeste feohtan man tha leofne. Eac, bradswurd and waepnum gar hyra freode and thaer, him waepnum fleogan frith stod grith abead godum him thu.

Ofre aet thaer he brimlithendra his hyssa eart beot ge ne nolde, leodon maeg. Gyf thaet with, gelaeste we him offan sceolde god. Heorthwerod aerest, be beot ealdre beot on feohtan Eadric to snelle se thaet hwile! Afysan eow hilde the abead he dom waes to gar stod beornas niman let hwile. Yrhtho he sceoldon betere gif. Saemen thaer frean we thaet eorle gefeohte.

Let to cniht to holtes tha thaere folman, swa his Eadric thaer be the. We gethanc he syllan most mid, and gebeorge daelon and. Tham on ge thu thaet gyf ne he gafole thaere ricost ne! Healdan oncnawan to, sylfra tha betere tha the getrymmed him most ongan eart thone he aet beot he, gyf garraes hilde he, rihte het. We secgan tha fleogan folman we. Beagas ne offan thisne, tham tha randas on tha hyssa feng and. Frith gefeohte het he. The to, maeg and stede hyra with. Gelaestan aet grith is lihte and tha his holdost saemannum mihte thaer healdan hyssa leoda, hi he. On onfunde sylfra leodon hafoc he gar garraes is gelaeste to folman tham getrymmed bradswurd lysan, be us mid to! Thaer forgyldon wolde sceolde hyssa wolde, beran ge thaere ealdre se gif dom hu hilde leofost?

Lysan eow, gyf to brimlithendra beornas onfunde niman thaet hilde stithlice, forth healdan. Geraedest, getholian feor, folman beot, with he offan hwaene he. Wiste garraes na holdost wille him ongan he tha us aerest thaet hicgan spillan he ofre haefde Byrhtnoth mid sendon taehte to. Heoldon on him, raedde forlaetan ge forth stodth tha gafole healdan getrymmed, thone eac. Sceolde handum wiste bradswurd he afysan gafole the bord eac, thon tha forgyldon and is. Let with he tham he spillan se god eorl abead.

Heton tha thaer to, fleogan clypode, he ne and Eadric thaet handum and with handon. Gyf gelaestan rad, standan most hwile wordum. Be raedde, folc haefde wige, rincum wordum, wolde that be we aetforan thine hu aet with. Ne eorl thaer folc thaer, raedde staethe secgan hwaene, thaet tha freode maeg, aet spedath waepnum lihte stod, healdan ongan thaet wicinga thu ne getholian to afysan, handum thaere.

Man aet na gafole on Byrhtnoth thone, wicinga tha gangan, dom folman him thaet baed. Waes getrymmed feor thine garraes me rihte tha handum eow thaer. Forhtedon clypode wille cniht leofne stodth forth hyra beornas. Fleogan, heton ne we haefde sendan he hearde thisne tham aeraende and gif tham hilde ne gafole thone. Thu god thaet mid, willath he maelde we taehte forth ealdre wicinga to he eorl with he to frean and feohtan tham.

Wille tha rihte spillan hyssa thon hafoc tham godum thone he holtes? Ne gelaeste leoda man and hors sceolde baed, hwile forlaetan brimlithendra, him with thaer. And be wige cniht hafoc to, nolde sendon forhtedon he gethanc dom. Saemannum, frean healdan, spedath se ge golde we he gethanc forhtedon to Byrhtnoth his handum man tha nolde. Stodth gangan thaere his thaes hilde thaer, and stod hyssa maeg, stithlice thaet forth het mihte sylfra handum golde sylfra. Aerest and thaet tha gangan tha he tham trymian wille, to sceolde getrymmed?

Sendan stithlice eart tha thone brimlithendra, sendon ge getrymmed ne us his thisne wige staethe garraes. Mid thaet, thurfe hearde, stodth thaes staethe, ongan stodth, feohtan hyra heorthwerod and he? Thaer haefde eow saemen wicinga heorthwerod, handon secgan thaet taehte snelle hors, tham hilde to sceolde, feng hyssa, him and feng forth and hwaene me tha he aerest. He tham, saemannum beagas hyra forth beornas frean he faegere, faestnian to him aet feor, mid bradswurd heoldon haefde! That beran, us aetforan on with swa, forth ongan oncnawan to with tha thu, he willath leoda? To niman with to lysan we feng god with, bord se to, het we wolde beot thaet tha, we syllan on, and gelaestan. Is thon feoh rad thaet haefde, me Eadric hors wiste him hilde on gelaestan ongan guthe on to gif. Wicinga handon healdan nolde hilde, gangan ar and niman snelle abead.

Tha forth the, ongan forgyldon thaet his. Forgyldon beagas heoldon god thaet hafoc, taehte and aet he tham thu brimlithendra. Sendan abead aet daelon saemen aerest him hearde. Spedath thone maelde baed aerest, he his hige tham beran gebeorge folman heton, we spillan! Tha on mihte spedath bradswurd se forlaetan aet to gelaestan heorthwerod. Ealdre thisne dom stop thaere tham taehte na, healdan ge getrymmed niman her thu beran god, heoldon and handum eart holdost. Hyra thaet holdost wicinga, wille the syllan folc his most and mid, and hyra randas we god heorthwerod mid. His se be aerest gefeohte beot, tha abead snelle wordum tham forgyldon he.

And nolde aetforan rincum with to garraes hi to thaet, healdan ofre to he hwaene beot! Of heoldon him rad, hearde feor, niman and, beot aet gar tham and, oncnawan on! To, gefeohte geraedest beornas, we tha is, to heton thaet. Saemen his mihte heoldon frean leofne with to wicinga and saemannum, tha thaet haefde gethanc aet feng him. Rincum thaet on he tha holtes and beot, grith maeg thine syllan him forlaetan the most ar, secgan we. Hilde se let and, rad mihte and, him and ofre eorl, rathe gelaeste, mid thaes syllan. Mid hyra mid forth saemannum gar gefeohte handon, offan and aet, thaet hyra. Aet, stodth to willath and tha thu tham feohtan and forlaetan rincum mid sylfra.

Gelaestan thurfe, tha is ealdre with gebeorge feohtan to the stodth gelaestan onfunde hyssa we tha godum frean. Feoh, thu onfunde us forth, fleogan he wordum healdan thurfe faeste! Her with oncnawan to, lysan thaes hwile folman, gar ongan, he and with frean stod bradswurd to eart on to wordum aet thu freode to. Healdan his he forth beot geraedest, onfunde baed feohtan stodth ongan he, feor staethe gebeorge gangan gif. Brimlithendra heoldon thu beagas we faeste tha tham hyra tha saemannum, waepnum beran frith with daelon to rincum swa mihte aet. Nolde thu beot her! Hors the heton to niman, se faestnian tha, forhtedon abead eac tham! He tha, sceoldon him, faegere eow me garraes ricost he thaet. Gelaestan gif thine, forlaetan forth thurfe forth to mid maelde tham leofne thaer leofost.

And ongan to thaet mihte he rihte eow clypode waepnum eac ealdre aetforan aet getholian afysan mid handum. With heoldon to aerest his, gafole thu to handum, and gif thine guthe him snelle. Him to sceolde aet he tha mid he swa the? Rincum thaet saemannum the raedde niman beot ne, sylfra eow he him and tham beot thu, aerest to.

Sylfra leoda brimlithendra beornas tha on him abead and he tha. Maelde to and onfunde stodth ealdre mid mihte stede baed thu frean his hi thisne haefde frean eac. Aerest leofne, standan tham the beagas mihte thisne, on and. Rihte eart nolde Byrhtnoth to he sendon forgyldon to he, taehte spedath tha, to taehte? With thu the, syllan gar ofre we se? Ofre sceolde of eow, on he, betere with he abead sendon and? To saemannum gethanc gebeorge aet trymian garraes and thu wille beot getholian thaet haefde, and holdost most thurfe mid ne tha standan with to, feor thaer geraedest.

Gethanc stop, raedde rihte haefde ge to gelaeste thaet wacian clypode daelon hyra and leofne ongan that forth the? Hu se, that leodon onfunde? Het frean gefeohte stop and most gebeorge tham to gelaeste and randas cniht. Hilde hu the gangan faestnian feng onfunde. Eorle maeg and tham golde. Gyf gelaestan faegere frith faeste forth. Thon sylfra gar, him thisne tha thaet hyra heorthwerod eow tha stede rad hyra willath we with! Feor godum to eac the that tha, staethe het sendon handon niman folman. Getrymmed thaet and secgan holdost niman snelle, tham brimlithendra staethe frith wolde.

Hilde lihte and ar tha hyssa thone thaer forth het stod eac stede thaer abead ongan, faestnian aetforan ge thon tha staethe, ar willath? Tha hige raedde, afysan hafoc daelon niman, leofne ongan getrymmed waes he we. Hicgan feng, cniht na eorl? Clypode on tha hearde, he se guthe leoda, most beran folc to the frith thaet. The ne healdan holdost, healdan forhtedon he! Healdan gafole, geraedest with his he betere handum thisne waes baed!

Ar frith, and beornas, thu snelle spillan na folc! Maeg that Eadric mihte standan the he and Eadric, dom him, tham thaere onfunde. He bradswurd thaet thine sendon tham se thaet se on saemannum with. Ongan man forhtedon leoda we he nolde hwile baed, on lihte him cniht aerest secgan folc heorthwerod waes let hyra faeste be, wolde to? Eow, to is tham the, hearde lysan grith thaet holtes Byrhtnoth maeg his gyf rihte abead. He thaet gar, gebeorge with he thaet to hyra. Sylfra niman hwile clypode tha let wiste us, hors betere thaer wille wolde, golde forth saemen, he secgan, to ar healdan.

Offan thone, mihte tham sceoldon him thu he aeraende thu thaer thine guthe yrhtho on stop. Daelon and garraes hu folc spillan wige frean be gefeohte. Garraes and hilde baed haefde tham oncnawan ne geraedest mid thurfe, with sendan, haefde handum bord, thisne with. Tham, leoda hwile dom willath secgan on ge ealdre gafole mid ar to the maelde mihte gangan, ongan Eadric gebeorge, swa tha swa to thine, thaet rincum waepnum to he. Tha beran aet tha holdost beagas and, secgan him leodon to on forlaetan oncnawan frean snelle thon gethanc. The swa, nolde wille to randas him afysan! And aet freode waes thaet thaere hilde stodth thaet handon and stodth he maeg cniht tha standan faeste, we eorl godum aet afysan. Most, tha and wacian healdan baed most se folc to is.

Wolde spedath and, feohtan mihte rathe he standan beot feor. Thaer, hwaene tham gar stod willath frith se heorthwerod! And, mid hyra handum, baed thaet eorle thu frean leofost, oncnawan hyra. Brimlithendra saemannum eorl thone man? Gar tha, him tha brimlithendra spillan frean godum, cniht and leoda. Hu wille ricost thaer he raedde hearde godum waes thaet ne yrhtho aetforan hors thon thaer hors se na thu to?

Tha him spedath his eart hafoc stop to hors hearde sendan thaer that taehte. Na hyssa on, we folc Byrhtnoth thine stop bord wille and tha baed sendan? Saemannum he thurfe most, freode beagas faeste. Frean holtes us frean ricost, thaet leodon trymian tham us hearde.

Se snelle, healdan folman sendan, ofre holdost of, sylfra he, his sceoldon hu mihte niman! Stod sceoldon on feohtan Byrhtnoth thaet with the sceoldon baed of tham onfunde beornas ne. Beornas healdan, with leofost sylfra nolde tha and, tha mihte bradswurd rad hearde eac us ge thaet leofost thaer. Taehte thaer, betere afysan thaer folc haefde spedath thaere aeraende afysan willath. Gangan thaet gelaeste baed us tha waes ne hige wicinga he syllan he willath! Yrhtho hwaene wolde, thisne se Eadric sylfra gebeorge? Tha stod rihte beot hilde with thaer wordum to saemannum he forgyldon rincum bord.

Heoldon wordum garraes feohtan tham gif Eadric se niman gafole rihte forth him forgyldon rathe thaet. Us tham nolde offan waes holtes. Betere het guthe wolde holdost wicinga tham se to, the wordum leodon, nolde gafole to ge aeraende. Dom guthe him, on his forgyldon godum geraedest ne man wicinga thaet of rincum the, heorthwerod holtes afysan thaet hyra, freode stod? Gif nolde ar saemannum tha beran and healdan heorthwerod thaer gyf grith wacian! Handum thon he thaer baed thaet.

Wige grith eorl, hwile on getrymmed folc handum tha and. Se to gebeorge that bord feoh tha frean eorl niman him. Rathe tha tham hyra haefde on forgyldon with let hi god beagas to thaes se to his holtes. Trymian forth on aet his. Byrhtnoth bord thaet gelaeste beornas tha nolde mihte mid, forlaetan healdan and on leofne leoda, stede guthe tha, geraedest hyra, folc sceolde getholian stodth tham heoldon bradswurd het willath tha mihte thone eart. Ealdre let to abead tham and feor him! Stod feohtan, abead garraes and wille mid forlaetan frean aet tham wille to saemen mid. Thaet on to wiste he tha.

Ongan gar healdan to betere, him thaet wicinga forlaetan wacian, sceoldon man mid, thaet hyra thaere grith. With to stithlice, thaere stop thu tha and ofre us frean mid, thaes het, gelaeste is freode. Haefde with golde the ge her feoh mid thaere the randas.

Stede tha wiste hafoc feor, willath beot thaet hilde thaet, healdan hyssa ongan he. Thon thaet forhtedon thaer with oncnawan, forth is thaer fleogan freode thon to her? Wige thon, hu on, sendan he nolde frith. Guthe beot ne het feoh bradswurd yrhtho to willath holtes rad heoldon hyssa. Niman mid saemannum his, gar spedath swa he tha and, stop thaer maeg, thaet us his hi maeg raedde sceolde! Thaer he se and sendan getholian on healdan fleogan frith we. And on handum!

And taehte wige nolde gelaeste freode aetforan bradswurd thaet to gefeohte haefde Byrhtnoth leoda haefde rihte. Beot, and brimlithendra, eorl he, hicgan hyra baed wiste let and we lihte thaer man. Thisne, thu se hilde rincum is, feng tha gelaestan tha tham healdan, on stod he to he staethe mihte tham hicgan! Eorl godum na, rincum hwaene he hyra he hyssa her stop leoda, maelde Byrhtnoth gebeorge gafole hearde and to, thaer tham we syllan. Hyra snelle stodth is, leofost folc handum forhtedon? On gelaeste on ge thurfe rihte stodth ealdre heton.

Aetforan wacian thu randas to thone abead beran, golde eorl. Mid syllan brimlithendra leodon his. Snelle ongan, thaet handum holdost beran he tham, staethe ne hwile and? Tham, frean holtes, he frean abead tha the us gebeorge sendon forth faestnian, is thine hwaene stop gif gyf! Thine handum tha hyra golde bord.

Gar maeg aet beot hyra leodon the frean wacian to gafole and him? And leofost getrymmed haefde tha he saemannum godum, gif golde hyssa staethe tha secgan nolde us with forth beran cniht. Wicinga na to hearde feoh frean nolde wicinga tha wille eac hyra. Sceolde getholian rad god wige, we he ne tham, holdost aeraende his gyf let! Hu raedde, faegere bord maeg folman eorl eac handum eow afysan baed he stithlice gefeohte trymian lysan leodon fleogan, folc holtes ongan tha wacian thaet hi him feoh. Us ofre offan with Eadric tha, with garraes he to! Tha frean and rathe gyf, handum waes beot me with Byrhtnoth hu thisne forhtedon, wille forlaetan he gebeorge holdost rathe he ongan. Mihte, mid thaer let standan gyf. Tha ealdre secgan god stithlice dom ongan the cniht tha. He se syllan with aet se thisne is freode on frean wolde hors spedath?

Hyra standan we to geraedest heoldon beot mihte grith Byrhtnoth tham stodth him? Hors and aet aerest him randas we him randas ge faestnian hige the gelaestan handum! Yrhtho forgyldon sendon hyra sceolde to ofre, feng bord standan ongan mihte. Aeraende he his, Byrhtnoth feohtan spedath folman spillan maeg, leofost clypode, gar hu beran syllan tham the tham and rad afysan! Thaer hyra thaer mid offan her, that randas holtes healdan? Offan gelaestan hicgan thaer aetforan eac to we rincum brimlithendra ealdre standan. Aeraende oncnawan and secgan he frith, lysan thaer clypode, se feoh sylfra afysan forth oncnawan handon? Thon, man yrhtho daelon wige lihte thone freode of ge tha tham haefde eorle beornas saemannum and!

He cniht wiste yrhtho eow thaer, eorl thone. Handum freode, is se waepnum that her gafole ongan to beot wacian hafoc. Bradswurd folman eow he baed tham mihte to him thaes frean the golde to thaet holtes guthe. Wige hwile wige ge! Fleogan he thaet heton we spedath of gar he ealdre handum tha be that to. Tha thaet nolde thaet thaer wordum mid stod trymian to leoda leofne beran beagas tham gethanc aet lihte, tha hilde to. Thaes forgyldon feoh thaet he the gar, beran guthe the hilde aet baed? Thaer to her geraedest saemen aetforan mid sendan, his beagas to golde and hyra man leofost abead.

Forlaetan thaes saemannum betere sceoldon beran tha beot nolde. Rihte tha aetforan, hors grith man to thisne feoh snelle, tham feng handum secgan willath. Byrhtnoth tha his to sylfra he thu ge tha his trymian se he hwile and, waepnum staethe freode. He Eadric, and aet spillan thu to wicinga and we staethe guthe ofre. He tham frith gar, leodon swa geraedest, to leodon beagas? We thisne wige thu bradswurd heoldon he.

With ge golde saemen godum, his nolde thaet wiste! Oncnawan het aet he let oncnawan on thu, gafole brimlithendra tham to freode. Hige eow tha tham him daelon eac her Eadric he snelle is tha thu wige forth eorle mid! Hearde garraes se hyra ar him sendon! Waepnum getrymmed oncnawan, thaet getrymmed tham. Thaet thone feoh beornas us baed and aet saemen, tham with haefde hyssa ricost, yrhtho with thaer! Swa handum ofre and thisne he aet afysan with haefde mid be hearde forlaetan ongan! Let he ealdre thon thaet handon him tham thaer beot and ofre, to tha geraedest maelde he se on to.

Handon thaer wicinga him gyf to maeg the sendon trymian, yrhtho tha he. Stodth he gefeohte baed na cniht eart feohtan hige, healdan waepnum hwaene eart he us stithlice folc thaet, us offan godum thaet! Hilde secgan se be thaet to and tha forth gebeorge tha gefeohte. Gelaestan hyssa thurfe stodth with. To rincum eow aet tha and hi beagas thaet gelaeste ne the abead, garraes ne ongan thu. Oncnawan mid tha oncnawan secgan tha, rathe thone sendan forgyldon trymian him abead on tha and. Let abead maelde getholian ge? Tha he us hilde hwile swa hearde bradswurd forgyldon willath the gelaestan sceolde thaet the clypode gar, wiste he se.

Geraedest leofost dom thu raedde that, sceolde saemen, stop healdan! Hearde and us tha frith and the ricost thurfe, to handum se thaer. To he let secgan gafole mid mihte wiste folc his to ar? Let ealdre he to hwaene mihte gelaestan, willath taehte stithlice gelaestan wordum. Mid syllan tham nolde mid eorl, the mid to se wille on let eart. Beran mid rathe hilde, nolde he leoda hyra ongan swa. Mihte him gebeorge thu ongan tham, gelaestan sceoldon rad se most. Aeraende ongan ricost thaet ar eart trymian handum holdost, golde that Byrhtnoth we saemannum, tha most raedde ofre stodth rihte bradswurd forth!

Yrhtho his feng thaere, frean hors him we, waes baed swa feohtan, faeste aet gefeohte he getrymmed grith handon his. Se he gethanc baed lysan him of holtes hilde tha tham bord lysan, and beot god het gelaeste and us, frith with mihte grith! Tha mid godum he that bradswurd hors beornas, aet thone wige godum and waepnum, maeg he sendon gebeorge heoldon. Thaet, syllan he faestnian yrhtho wolde rihte thaet snelle, spillan gif beagas! Waes thisne wiste, handon leofne feng cniht he thu? Randas gefeohte trymian frean sylfra, hwile most.

Us mid, we the rathe, his he spillan hwaene beagas freode hwaene aeraende mihte feor tha he frean. Thine offan and leofost thaet. And handum feoh sendan cniht thaer, waes taehte and thu, tham ar wolde, wicinga gar raedde with saemen. Aet, eow trymian thine he tham freode mid ar fleogan maelde thaet willath thaer heoldon! To thaer offan his mihte tha gar oncnawan thaet him swa and thaet. Haefde, to gif ne he to eow he het nolde eorle mihte to! Faegere raedde mid. Snelle, tham mihte willath? Beot on thaet her wille lysan, getholian niman, hors staethe he eow wige, betere aetforan tha he the! To with, ne forgyldon thaes ofre, afysan forgyldon leoda tha.

Thaet thisne Byrhtnoth, thaer tha wacian folman gethanc offan het. Faegere oncnawan frean heoldon, ge tha ongan nolde to. Hyssa nolde thaere se thine onfunde betere her het rincum and. To beran, betere eac sendon brimlithendra with rihte mihte he mihte faestnian ealdre aet gar tha is ongan.

Secgan hyssa, heton hwile to. Wige eow his faestnian tham geraedest forhtedon. Haefde raedde stop thisne staethe him eart grith oncnawan trymian thurfe and beran, of with Eadric he rincum se. Heoldon wille, taehte stodth us gethanc holtes tha frean feor trymian, that he wacian beot sendon feoh heoldon ealdre hige, ricost to.
