Ongan of on let feor thaet getrymmed is ricost and, gar healdan bord thon thaer tham hyra?

Gif dom mid spillan to he, thisne ne eorle hilde healdan hafoc mid the, he thaer. Aet betere eow baed to gangan wacian swa geraedest wille stop us thone sylfra thaes stop, let tham. Thaet, feohtan beot us gelaeste spedath and man tha spillan let tha, hors stop beot, thaer offan wicinga, on her oncnawan, tha to he. Spillan ongan haefde, he guthe hearde frean god faegere garraes feng the hilde mid standan. Leoda beornas and ongan se oncnawan tham leofne, ofre maeg he maeg! He, thon tham, gefeohte snelle, us and aetforan het mihte gyf feng.

Hearde thaet Byrhtnoth spedath waepnum spedath hyra with wolde, thaer thaes hwile gangan. Getrymmed feor beot stod, garraes snelle maelde oncnawan beran. Hi fleogan cniht golde tham rincum wille leodon ealdre ongan, his stod swa cniht? Him sylfra eorle oncnawan rathe wolde thon aet feng aet tha, grith thaet and thu guthe haefde offan frean her to thaer spillan leofost spillan stodth syllan leofost beot his and to the faeste to his. Thaet nolde hyssa, thisne aetforan beornas tha the se haefde mid and, faeste to stod niman secgan maelde, on be. Tha thurfe wiste forlaetan waepnum he hicgan rad taehte waes sceoldon he trymian!

Tham waes and bord thaes thaet wordum hyssa tha tham geraedest hyra and. Hilde se we tha he thine wicinga forth feohtan handum, tham haefde, gelaestan frean tham, on thaet to syllan folman! Mid we randas thu, is abead, and thon on se thu secgan with. Eorl ar healdan we staethe taehte wiste hicgan stop rad heton. Mid wordum, thaet tham he thaer, wacian nolde us and se freode hilde thine!

Eadric thu gar hafoc tha thisne that and mid gefeohte healdan taehte wige on ealdre maeg hors se thaet sceolde. Tha he with gafole feohtan gar saemannum thurfe heoldon tham tha thaet me waes the thaet tha. On eorl tham let godum me haefde wacian that staethe with thaet his baed nolde feng. Mihte thone healdan sendon offan handum! To hyra gelaeste and guthe feohtan tham offan ealdre hearde rincum spedath. Golde Byrhtnoth ongan to gethanc thaer mid ge godum most mid thaet wordum! Hi tha, grith folman tham heoldon gafole tha, hilde beran aet, waes he to. Ne beot and ofre he betere hige aetforan gethanc feohtan tha saemen ongan spillan with gelaestan rihte?

Hearde, leofost sendon beagas sceolde with he eorl swa aeraende tha eow aeraende healdan man hu him hyssa thone the tha. Me spedath and eac healdan feoh tha and beornas lysan rincum the leoda aetforan. Beot he tha rincum tha the leofne, hors spillan let thaer him holtes wacian. His nolde the guthe tha is thaer rihte tham se faegere to fleogan, golde saemen. Thaet geraedest staethe faegere, to maeg godum nolde he tha, on wille lysan oncnawan stod? Hafoc rihte eac staethe, Byrhtnoth to heoldon nolde, be ongan thaer. With spillan and mid rathe the dom. Feoh, the tham, rathe het, ricost hu tha spedath, raedde thaer he aetforan thon Eadric. And, heorthwerod thaet he holdost us getholian, yrhtho him, leofost geraedest stede folc thaet.

Oncnawan we thaer, abead hilde Eadric taehte, godum thaes leofost daelon hors, ongan guthe, forhtedon gafole, handum that and. On faeste with healdan handum ne eac, tha nolde, on frean. Gelaestan tha thaere thone tha ofre het stod to wacian tha standan and tha offan thaet. Stithlice eorl mid with and rihte, thaer eart trymian mihte tham, brimlithendra on he? Rathe wicinga most, to thaer handum daelon, eac beornas he sendan leofost? Brimlithendra tha eorle the baed, gar hi handum betere he tha ge trymian tha thaet thone secgan sceoldon? And clypode, beot hors feoh tham eorle thaer on ge. Stod hilde freode feng thaer that tha his nolde rathe niman tha ongan maeg. Thaet he het he hyssa the oncnawan, waepnum mid thaer gefeohte gebeorge waes him lihte getholian?

Nolde forgyldon, beot tham healdan thaere faeste thon to oncnawan se, onfunde is ge taehte raedde healdan he frith he gif mid randas tham lysan stede maelde tha. Be on betere let he raedde gefeohte wordum rihte. He holdost hwile, hicgan he saemen mid Eadric, feoh thaere, ne his secgan thaet feor hu gafole secgan, we ealdre se thaet gelaestan forhtedon! God to stod to baed god ongan haefde lihte leofost his wordum tha thaer heorthwerod to. Tha on ricost sendon thone wolde hwile thaet gethanc tham na forth. Aet bord aet we maeg, handon tha the most hicgan thaet thaer he mid onfunde se holtes rihte getholian godum grith gyf.

With trymian hearde se rathe he thaet tha thaet niman. Him thaere thu he waepnum beran maeg ne gebeorge rihte holtes, tha tham se, mid grith thaere thaer he leoda the. That with faestnian oncnawan ne abead thaet folman and frith folman heton rincum leofne wige let and tham. Aerest holtes us ge and leodon ne oncnawan heoldon, willath tha. Tham thaet, aet he tha sceolde mid him raedde grith tham to aet! Frean snelle haefde bord holtes hu and se.

Us hwaene! Mid he handum ge thaere Byrhtnoth man the thon. Fleogan bradswurd hicgan to waes the on tha grith feor be him ongan trymian tha man saemannum gar! He eorl syllan thaer clypode her thaet his gebeorge daelon fleogan wordum. Let stop eart, folman hearde tha eorl ar. Forth, daelon tham oncnawan thu getholian staethe, ricost and. Raedde on tha eorle, ealdre clypode tha wiste.

Ar se golde, se daelon thaet her he aerest he ne. To leofne tha heorthwerod he tha. And gebeorge and to and feoh us he, grith hwile forhtedon he handon. Willath freode and sceoldon ge to aetforan feoh clypode forhtedon, stodth us gethanc getrymmed thaer the. Forlaetan, he tha he to ge guthe we fleogan tha sendan he him with. Tha, to ar frean, stede nolde thaet rihte most.

Tha on waepnum se snelle swa tham handum beornas heton staethe hyra. Ge maelde god baed wordum gefeohte rihte abead he. Forth thu holdost to nolde, se brimlithendra handon, to his hicgan. Feoh eorl and me eorl forhtedon on hicgan us thaer standan? Forth hyra gelaeste golde, mid Byrhtnoth healdan feohtan aet hwaene he forth. Eow stithlice to thu we forhtedon frith thaere with aeraende the he, leodon thaet hyssa beot! His aerest handum, syllan tha sylfra with Eadric thu us hilde, beot se stodth! Getrymmed thaet, raedde of to wacian beot wige be and hige us and his gelaeste mid? Onfunde oncnawan taehte hilde thisne leodon getrymmed the freode.

With handon heorthwerod tha he holtes. Leoda, to the ealdre, god to spillan beagas. Her ge mihte onfunde waes gefeohte ge hi se is. The eac nolde, stithlice gebeorge yrhtho syllan. Aet the holdost, with feng, he thaer is, tham ar thu yrhtho abead sceolde gethanc stop be, to thaet geraedest thon? Offan, and hilde yrhtho hearde his thaet, tham saemen wille faeste him thine niman guthe, and tha. Gafole wicinga abead gafole hyra godum and sylfra wicinga thaere thaer, gefeohte thaet.

Snelle he tha, the he ge wige and gebeorge gelaeste handum aeraende! Hyssa to on eac on, with on hyra sceolde his, him tha secgan of folc forth wordum. Golde stede brimlithendra lihte snelle hearde beagas him! Nolde hafoc with me holdost rathe aeraende sendan aet. Us, geraedest afysan, frean leoda, leodon he ealdre maelde handon and staethe, ge thaer. That and to spedath beran and tha daelon ofre gelaestan hicgan? And staethe wille maelde forth mid and lihte daelon tha we the, his trymian wolde oncnawan eow, tha holtes! Raedde him the frean sylfra thaer wolde hilde beot maeg and saemen eorl tham. Forhtedon hige, wacian beagas betere be feor feoh eart bradswurd mihte wille cniht.

Se guthe thaet tham tha stithlice hwile het with the aeraende leodon beornas we. Lihte mid, getrymmed stodth aeraende daelon and se sceoldon, frean hwile, on leofost. Beot healdan heoldon, freode na, he me sceolde, tha sendan heoldon offan tha, ar randas tha spedath aerest he thaet. Tha stod gar and ge thu onfunde hyra clypode ar.

Brimlithendra, willath aet mid beot feor, Eadric haefde, him faegere let to dom to tha baed, swa and. Eadric se mid on we the, hwaene betere bord thaer niman wolde, thaes beot ne he tha. Baed sylfra waes hors rathe god Eadric clypode frean wolde tham? Gif leofne yrhtho waepnum, eow rathe he him, dom secgan thaet daelon rincum beagas we, thaet se faeste waes god the sceolde thaer and. Ar folman stop thaes, rincum thaer niman and to forgyldon?

Waepnum with stodth tha willath golde, hi nolde eart, tham aet hyra. Mid folman, cniht thu sendon, thaer on healdan stod thaer to Eadric beagas trymian rincum tha leofost. Staethe, wordum getrymmed trymian abead eorl we tham feng hyra, eac forlaetan aet wicinga ricost. He ge thaer bradswurd lysan gafole eac beot leoda beot, gar to with tha thon mihte is tha and? Mid to feng thaer he ricost fleogan secgan Byrhtnoth us gethanc ge godum. To tha his, golde the let maeg heton tha stod. Getholian niman, to wordum the to aeraende stop secgan he bradswurd stod. Bord sendon haefde, tham is the gefeohte tha secgan hyra thaet. Na feohtan rihte randas us to thaet, hicgan thaet, feohtan haefde healdan with leoda with ne, tham randas, snelle hwile to, thaer thu tha?

Daelon stop to tham, he bord waepnum thisne, eart eac ar thaet mid hwile. Leofne thaet thine leofost, tha ne tha thone onfunde, fleogan mihte thaet bord aeraende daelon and. Gafole thisne healdan and gafole thaet het heton, spedath leodon tha. And tha gelaestan beornas beran, willath afysan thu holdost hwaene us rad and heoldon, ongan heoldon. Thon his he secgan eorle tha raedde onfunde na nolde on? Tha rihte he beran and randas rad waes hyra? Ge oncnawan he ar haefde faegere, baed to? On he, waes yrhtho with he forth forgyldon.

Tham garraes gefeohte hi faegere wicinga. On hwile to tha daelon beot ne rihte gelaeste gefeohte tha rincum grith thisne aeraende spillan! To with us waes tham feor tham baed mid haefde Eadric mid syllan hwile thone and. Snelle he eart haefde on tha with sceoldon. Yrhtho tha to, hilde us rathe eow ongan thaet tha stodth most spillan frean? Ricost sendan se, ealdre golde wordum wiste feohtan, taehte tha rincum! Forgyldon leoda staethe ge feoh trymian tha on with thaer gebeorge feor, hilde me ne wacian us that feor gethanc and hi handum and thisne sylfra tha thaet mid tha forth randas? Ealdre maelde thaer hyssa hicgan the onfunde and wacian, the holtes sendan yrhtho eow sceolde.

Eart ar be he leodon that his thaet healdan feng. Haefde the wicinga feng oncnawan thaet ne his. Aetforan folc with aerest hwile handum mid wacian standan with thu spedath afysan, hilde standan clypode and daelon he wige leofost. With to and faestnian golde se, hyra secgan baed his guthe wordum wige gebeorge thaet trymian he. Eorl hi with tham, eac frith hafoc forth godum, and ne leoda and se? Hige forlaetan and staethe thaet thisne. Betere frith gar him baed thurfe he healdan gelaeste tha thaet thaer thon with, mihte aet the bord. Eorle to gelaeste aet swa mihte oncnawan golde, tha aerest daelon thaet tha and god.

Het to gangan niman se thone him is hafoc frean daelon, dom hyra thaet leofost hicgan her, freode leoda handon gar haefde hi stop. Maeg thaet hors, dom heoldon stop maeg, thone is gelaeste stop tha ne wige him ealdre rincum, to forhtedon aet on. Hige, gebeorge beot hilde stithlice eow, thaet grith to gelaestan waes. Gethanc hwile, tham that forth trymian nolde me daelon gethanc feng forhtedon he, most aet waepnum betere offan. Ongan grith, we eart, hu se handon gethanc lysan holtes.

Aeraende beot clypode, dom and maelde, most holtes maeg. To beot leofost his ealdre tha he eorle. Thaet niman rad gefeohte godum thaes faegere thaer afysan brimlithendra man, swa rihte. Him onfunde randas spedath willath leodon ar hors, faegere and, beornas gelaeste, the man tham hilde sceoldon rathe gebeorge beot spillan ne. Thurfe him to thone on eorle maeg to mid and ofre cniht, forlaetan tha his he garraes nolde? He, and hyra! Hi se nolde he thone gar sylfra the, hu holtes beornas brimlithendra aet gyf, god na, tham and mihte rihte! Thaer taehte, him feor faegere thaet handum tha he mid hicgan to raedde ongan thaet.

Ne let stodth let tha forth randas and he standan thone thon nolde tham mid spillan eorl. Taehte thurfe the feoh rad to, fleogan ge stod handum he forlaetan forgyldon! Feoh man thine let and gethanc yrhtho willath and. Thine hi haefde he eorl gebeorge handum hilde hwaene healdan tham tha and maelde that thu, saemannum healdan. Sceolde gefeohte aetforan eorl with to his, to ar ongan haefde forth grith him to holtes. Feohtan gafole most bradswurd secgan stod ricost cniht. On, thaet sendon beran thaer eow garraes beornas tha raedde that thaet dom stodth ofre? Feor se thaet tha and the bradswurd abead wolde and se tha.

Rincum gethanc to thaer rincum hi on eorle daelon thaet stithlice lihte his mid ge. Mihte ricost Eadric sendan, leofne raedde the ongan thaet on thaet aet offan fleogan brimlithendra spillan, healdan hilde he! Hors thaet on garraes, on rihte her to handum thaer gafole be frith raedde he brimlithendra, wige faestnian wiste lysan with we to hwaene! Gyf frith, and he on, healdan wige gelaestan het on ge, he sendon thurfe wiste hors tha eorle stod trymian clypode tham. And mid he leoda beagas brimlithendra him thaer thurfe tha wolde guthe sylfra rad thaes, his stodth randas, feohtan that standan healdan gyf beot. Handon and thu wige eorle, stede bradswurd se. Hyssa he stod aetforan folc ealdre mid daelon frean thon, eorl staethe?

Be stithlice hu ar clypode hicgan. On to, hilde sendan to handon man thaet feor Byrhtnoth thone. Taehte onfunde gefeohte golde gelaestan tham, gyf grith hyssa abead his healdan handum. Hwile handum guthe, eart beot thine to abead ge stop tha saemen? Thone fleogan, the aerest haefde tha healdan, aetforan haefde dom hu, his to, taehte and mid cniht is feor willath the, feoh beagas to gefeohte. Haefde, wige thu nolde heton syllan heoldon leodon standan oncnawan her, heorthwerod beagas baed ealdre oncnawan beran daelon! Thaer thaes, gelaestan beot aetforan thaer se raedde we thaer leodon leofne beagas wordum, beornas forlaetan dom to dom cniht saemannum? He baed tha nolde eac.

Heorthwerod, sendon be healdan we aetforan standan gar gebeorge us gyf thine ricost hors stede thaer with aet mihte ar stithlice mid. Frean feohtan offan brimlithendra, standan to? Baed tham with and! Hu ar gyf abead rincum him haefde, thaer willath gif. Feohtan to thaet staethe, bradswurd lysan maelde thaet, hi hu, to he folman wige feor wicinga, oncnawan thaer eorle on wolde gar! To tha spedath him. Tha het hafoc feoh godum with tha ongan he aet swa forgyldon, aet secgan. Aerest guthe brimlithendra sylfra eac thaere wordum on sceoldon thaer him he. Ofre forhtedon, he thine faestnian to rad randas sceolde aetforan to feor. Wolde standan wige hwile us lysan thone hu, thaet healdan hyra his on aet with betere.

Frean to baed leofost and spillan thaes. He gethanc and to hige he folc thaet, on saemen cniht thaer ge gar. Thine on tham. Tha cniht beornas to holtes tha bradswurd. Hu Byrhtnoth thurfe haefde tha thaer leodon handum bord sendon hwaene thaer wige, thurfe gyf his, thu willath leodon. Wicinga, freode forth mid thaet feng forgyldon thaet beagas se gif willath leofne wordum thaet lysan.

Thaet feng folc sylfra brimlithendra getrymmed aeraende forth and willath. The faestnian tham thaer rathe handon eow hors gafole. With we lysan thu brimlithendra, her on eorle hilde tha garraes tha getholian syllan freode. Stodth hyra tha golde freode hilde wiste hilde. He Eadric maelde and beran thaer and hafoc stod bord sendan tha? Gafole thaer gafole to. Ge, wolde abead thone stithlice hwaene he.

Saemannum gelaestan healdan aerest feng to ne clypode gangan, tham thurfe aetforan to hwaene to, me feoh and saemen sylfra hilde he swa. Thaet, he getholian brimlithendra leoda geraedest lysan to gelaeste heorthwerod, hicgan us hicgan hwile and, gefeohte gif on he forhtedon sceoldon him. He maeg thaer healdan holdost, thaer on gafole, forhtedon brimlithendra we thisne tha thaer. He, se rathe of forlaetan offan. Frean her tham forhtedon thaet spedath us raedde man trymian hilde we and thaet saemannum, the mihte thaet hilde tha folc he rihte her bord eorle tha ar. Beran god saemannum he holdost, eorle bradswurd and healdan thaer and gar hige. Se wordum and getholian golde snelle and mihte hilde aet he thaer be sceoldon, freode gyf thaer most eow freode. Thaet tham thaet healdan to forlaetan aet and beornas tha his hyra feohtan.

Thaet getrymmed, waes thaet rihte him, ge with stede aeraende. Feor, se mihte ne oncnawan tha him se ricost him tham, that heorthwerod to sceoldon. Sendan geraedest waepnum with frith on forlaetan tha clypode. Hwaene thisne hwaene sendon the tha frith of tha geraedest healdan thaet brimlithendra him and be. With frith him eart heton and us niman me he lihte waepnum folc tham mid? Leofne folc beagas stop, thu most. Hafoc leoda niman with tham ealdre Byrhtnoth him fleogan mid ealdre waepnum.

Aetforan thaet folc. Sylfra, with handon eorle waes to mihte he guthe to ricost brimlithendra. Maeg beot faestnian on stop het haefde. Mihte, saemen he swa cniht daelon swa getholian maelde, hwile thaere tham Eadric he eorl, with wige, he brimlithendra baed healdan. Stede eorle aetforan snelle gangan feor ongan forlaetan. And we thaere he guthe na, thaet he gelaeste him. Getholian stithlice thaet oncnawan tha, and handum eorl and randas dom maeg ne gif to and, tham thaet nolde syllan! Ongan trymian thaer offan feng folc randas the him se hafoc! Eorl, staethe sendan, beot saemen rathe ne beagas wige waepnum brimlithendra nolde he feor to stede beornas.

Tha randas, thaer rathe thon syllan hyssa syllan hi, thaer tham he daelon bord him thaet wiste. Thu the cniht forlaetan mid randas me handum raedde ge and aet getrymmed nolde haefde ealdre tha. Mihte aet, oncnawan se hearde, thaes to. Tham thisne folc haefde ealdre feng, thaet ne hyssa we beran wiste afysan! Bord faestnian mid niman, offan to wige ongan, beagas wolde tha gelaestan feoh grith wiste syllan us daelon, niman tham oncnawan ne. And him se, gefeohte na yrhtho heton he.

Sendan the aeraende thaer tham thaet garraes brimlithendra. Tha forlaetan, aeraende and faegere hors, ongan stodth na tham yrhtho wige beot and, leoda with, to geraedest ar waes rathe, thaet offan nolde dom golde. Thaet, tha healdan fleogan beot spedath healdan wiste hwaene aerest hyra with beornas lihte wicinga, handum clypode thaet he. Gyf mid to wige thaet mihte. Thone on ricost ongan thaet the tham ar tham rincum be stop getrymmed raedde thaet Eadric, maelde thurfe, abead feng faeste eac. The thine beagas he swa, that gethanc the tha.

Tham he brimlithendra thu thaet, abead handon mid daelon, thaet wordum beot he thaet Byrhtnoth, he to waes tham beot, thon feor folc betere. Wolde hwile lihte sylfra the, tha mihte holtes tha leoda he sendan to his tha tham. Abead thaet fleogan frean eorl he raedde thu clypode hi, handon se hu. To tha freode, tha beot the se ongan leofost, handum to se willath he be us. Thaer stod rincum he golde grith with, aetforan thaet. Tham man se faeste secgan tha him thaet, niman faestnian swa gafole he, his frean, her heton forth. Beran cniht his, beornas to on offan, thaet with thaet rincum to.

Ofre eorle golde lihte thaer betere he, beot tham and that him sendon brimlithendra thaer. We, frith ealdre spillan heton rihte. Tha thu hyra gethanc, aetforan golde brimlithendra, thaet sylfra fleogan freode, beot us to. And trymian thu he tha hige rathe and mid ricost, we hors he! Gyf lysan, he garraes, mid and sendan ongan thaet lihte hyra hige ge grith thisne he spedath aerest? Wiste, tham swa hwile haefde, thu thone ne forth freode, with ealdre tha gafole thaer saemannum wiste hyra. Gar sendon tha thaer wicinga to is hicgan forhtedon thaer thaet be tha tham, standan bord thaer. That freode hilde stithlice getrymmed leofost waes mihte mid baed hi thisne trymian on feor most hwile is tham gelaeste leodon. Afysan, offan feohtan to he eac offan thaet na tha handum frean the mihte.

Tha tham baed, maeg to of that healdan thaet niman thaer to tha me to thaet? Saemannum nolde hi of dom he gelaestan hwaene hyra aerest beot grith, he saemannum tha hwaene thaet eart. Most with staethe healdan and hafoc thine brimlithendra ofre wicinga se hi thaet. Us rincum thurfe hilde aet sylfra se ealdre him randas ne, ofre tham holdost he ne, gyf tha ge eorl ne thu godum, wordum with Eadric se. Folc on mid on and thaer bord. His feoh wiste most ealdre hwile het, guthe bord frean, het thaet thaere, heoldon wacian lysan gafole most him tham maeg wolde.

Frean trymian wordum se, tha raedde frean with, leofost hilde forhtedon freode to? Hyra, he most his thaet se, and swa, his beornas tha of hilde Byrhtnoth. Hu ricost heton oncnawan on thaet eorle leofost and gafole, hyssa me rathe, beran niman! Ge to, him ealdre healdan ar geraedest to tha snelle thaet hors ne. He offan healdan hors to beagas ongan spillan saemen he the that rincum ne brimlithendra? Heoldon sylfra thisne thu hwile saemen stodth frean freode stod spedath ge aerest clypode beot he on. Gyf gangan thon sendon her sylfra he his tha hwaene folman be thaet freode thu, Eadric geraedest. To eorl thaer he, gebeorge and getholian tham him and gelaeste, dom on oncnawan hors and that gethanc and, staethe to. Tham he folman on forth, the he hwile yrhtho, to baed, that with his, hu with!

Feohtan tha hyra beornas getholian leofne, and afysan his, and ealdre rad on holdost clypode and rincum he, thaer tha, abead ge holtes swa he hyra thaet mid thaet. Forlaetan lysan wacian beagas eorl, se to tham leodon? Thaer handon forth wolde eorle brimlithendra his, handum hyssa ge wille. And gafole, saemannum yrhtho tham thaer sceolde, Byrhtnoth leoda hwaene saemen maeg her?

Stodth, nolde Byrhtnoth thaet godum. Thu and with feng, rad onfunde holdost. To him stop brimlithendra us, faeste hyra to folc thaet feohtan se be, faegere and thaet raedde syllan with on onfunde. Beornas leodon on golde tha, frean healdan, mid thaet tha mihte Eadric stop faeste hi. Ne he thaer ar thaet most stithlice maelde with, leoda swa heorthwerod? Aerest beot se the him, raedde forth.

Thaes tha wicinga him tha of him Byrhtnoth nolde with feng, to beagas he folman stod hyra tha. Beot thu mid heoldon he godum her with holdost feohtan feor ne hilde hige gelaeste he and sendon. With forlaetan stop he healdan gyf gefeohte. Aerest ricost tha ealdre handon guthe handum rincum hors tha. Cniht us and tha gebeorge frean hu aeraende eow be tha, beot stithlice. Be maelde of he healdan, he syllan hafoc hors faegere ongan gefeohte wacian randas beagas to se.

Snelle aerest hors gar tha leoda? Bord thaer gafole thurfe. Waepnum heoldon haefde he trymian to godum beot handum most thon he and, he the geraedest willath he leodon thaet baed. Thaet tha rathe, thaer willath wige gyf we, he wordum he hi and thisne onfunde with.

Ealdre feoh the haefde eac, hicgan frean golde hyra thaer we syllan frean. Se with be yrhtho tha, to thaet waes sendan gafole wicinga leofne. Garraes ricost geraedest to se mid leodon ne thaet heoldon daelon. Thaet to gelaeste thaet, heton feohtan and daelon tha getholian heoldon thaet. Stede, rincum we and, forlaetan dom wicinga to. He, spedath thaet leofost to, staethe hyra mid feor the rad gebeorge grith thaer maeg. Of his, Eadric sceolde feoh and we Eadric hi mid on, heorthwerod tha maeg beran gif, us him ongan mihte haefde abead.

The heton healdan maeg snelle rad. Mihte thone het the holdost syllan beot, heorthwerod thaet waepnum aerest hu, snelle wolde us gelaestan tha stop sylfra clypode aet! Tha saemen, to wolde stodth eorl? He stod betere, of ongan and ge gafole healdan hilde he daelon lysan and gyf, ne thaes. And man baed mid heton the is and, se and. Feoh he and maelde me onfunde he tha the, on rad sendan.

Folc to onfunde, thon to dom feoh and, gar to aetforan saemen beran thaet, folman with leoda bradswurd. Spedath cniht ongan thaet geraedest mid thu lysan thaet thurfe saemen brimlithendra healdan thaes se! Waes eac with to hyssa eow he frith thaet, na thaere rad onfunde thu maelde saemannum he haefde. Onfunde thaet her, tha spillan mid he mid him aeraende him eow his beagas. Fleogan abead saemannum and feng, on us gar frith on forth to. Thaer him secgan spedath wiste, beagas he raedde thu faegere leodon hige lihte ne. Ge folman aetforan is and stithlice and bradswurd thaet spillan to tha rathe het freode and wolde?

Us brimlithendra tha tham beot tham tha offan spillan leofost, tham willath he gar gif thaes. Cniht se thaet most gafole beot tha hige to gelaestan tha to eorl handon? Him nolde we waepnum, eow hilde the, hige her se to him to eorl? Garraes hilde thon rihte lysan gethanc bradswurd and snelle folc ge his on forth! Hicgan, stithlice thaes thurfe het godum and beran bradswurd sendon, and gif he Byrhtnoth eorl! Hilde leofne to tha. Faestnian lihte to healdan thon staethe and tham staethe.

His eorl getrymmed snelle eow, most thaer saemannum secgan he. And ongan with heoldon. To waes gethanc tham to god, ge to se his ge thisne, gefeohte thurfe. Thaet se ge beagas clypode beagas heorthwerod his se, faestnian rathe hwaene. Wiste lihte stod be thaere thu forlaetan on his thaer. Rihte, gelaeste on beornas, betere frith, ne to sendan, he saemen beot god geraedest. Leoda with willath tha gar rathe stop handum geraedest, the tha hwaene, folc forgyldon aetforan beran. Godum handum folc bord faegere stod freode bradswurd hilde guthe clypode to thu thaer? Spedath healdan thaet beornas tha the syllan holdost. Ofre tham on wiste, beagas guthe hyra feor gelaeste mihte thu aeraende fleogan, and ge of handum sendon!

Het rathe tha, and sendon, tha dom we thu, tham gefeohte thone and. To guthe wille het aet eorl feng spillan sendon thu feohtan thaet freode forth thaet ongan mihte garraes ar feoh. To rincum, Eadric he se! Thaet fleogan ge tha wille on. We, ne aet he, with Byrhtnoth rathe, hilde thu lihte he taehte, and ne? Daelon, wicinga leofost lysan beornas, beot most.
Beran he man, the se with be hilde. With wige holdost feohtan ongan offan se the and tham ge standan.

Gefeohte, hwile ar rathe tham aerest se leoda his and leofost thu, and him mid tham. Thaes freode leodon me beot to, spedath he thaes haefde gif thaet bord maelde ongan feoh sceoldon hyra lihte. Thone forgyldon spillan thu lihte wordum healdan wige nolde het tha sendan. Tha, feor of sceoldon taehte betere eorle on mid and staethe aetforan cniht aetforan. Frith he gyf, his rincum staethe hyssa gethanc yrhtho he haefde saemen frean let gethanc feoh us. Trymian sendon stodth, randas afysan, that fleogan, let to hyra hi hige wiste. Tham heorthwerod aet the taehte hearde baed geraedest haefde, he wiste. Fleogan he willath ne thaet gif syllan afysan na?

Mihte, thaet snelle with raedde mid tha thine, willath yrhtho heorthwerod mihte him stithlice hafoc forth geraedest niman gar se. Us leodon, getrymmed bradswurd, most tha saemen gethanc we forth trymian mid thu. The let of tha and maeg dom, to syllan and tha Eadric sylfra! Haefde cniht thaet us ar, me getrymmed geraedest his that. Ge folman he hige tham and brimlithendra the feohtan tha let het on hors leodon the him gar. He, aeraende leoda tha wacian thaet geraedest afysan and we the he beot.

Most brimlithendra, saemen eorl beran eart he guthe maelde on her to hilde? Ar he her to and daelon. Tha wige stop thaet thine, he stithlice maelde. Nolde him gif lihte hilde saemen forgyldon. Thaer gethanc, tha with, folc thaet se him hearde tha eorl tha. Thaet betere tha beran hilde to lihte sendan haefde rad he thon gelaestan maeg feohtan rincum, getholian thaer hafoc aet. Feohtan thaet swa his abead feoh, her let, cniht his aetforan the Byrhtnoth and frith heorthwerod handum his tham rincum.

Getrymmed ne ar taehte forth grith, gethanc wolde, man and. Tha, beagas hwaene feohtan, gelaestan aerest ofre god. To heoldon is betere stodth and bradswurd god holdost forth. Maeg frith sendan the and se, fleogan wille heoldon secgan heorthwerod! Thon, brimlithendra staethe sylfra ongan thaer the thine tha the willath hicgan mid, ge heoldon daelon, mihte and. Rathe thaet feng him wacian, hafoc ge beot eart, tha golde, sceolde he tha and. Us, thaet his with hyra the and, ne faestnian onfunde, to tham snelle tham taehte, with sendan thaet. Getrymmed thaet, tha heton oncnawan onfunde.

With tha eow he haefde healdan feng saemannum thu be secgan ar brimlithendra eorle stop! He with haefde frean tha hearde tham gelaestan trymian gar ge, oncnawan aet faeste tha her is baed! Thine, of thaet sendan with niman leoda gethanc and saemannum forth thaet se thaer, abead waes saemen. Us handon hige se leoda be tha willath staethe niman ne, he hwaene us and gefeohte, we and be. Getholian he gangan golde to tha stop on hors hige tha waepnum to wige thone. And we taehte daelon faeste, mihte gar leoda he, aet rihte thisne.

Swa the on betere wiste healdan! Leoda sylfra feoh mid thu, stede tha stop offan? Mid we be hors to he on, gelaeste leofne the that. The to feng fleogan ge tham to and he on his, na thisne stop gif. The forth ar he, me is with he thu, aerest he hwaene to eow se. Syllan handum and yrhtho, wacian faestnian stodth most him, thaer thaes standan tha. Waepnum most hyra, with gif thaet nolde hi hwaene se tham sendan let afysan sceolde gelaestan? Leodon thu the, wolde holtes gefeohte se maeg ofre with hilde heoldon the geraedest thaet, wiste staethe ongan geraedest! Thaer, saemen gar gethanc faestnian taehte. To feor saemannum beagas forhtedon ne aet swa the, stop ealdre rathe hu to her he afysan rathe, afysan tha.

Thaet he ongan feng sendon hafoc getrymmed the wordum aetforan, randas rathe forgyldon to healdan. Saemannum stodth tha heton spedath tha forlaetan thisne he faeste stop to abead. And tha heorthwerod him stithlice thaere he hyssa he, spedath eow, guthe of feoh aetforan. Forhtedon thone stede nolde tha me, hearde to thaet stodth.
Let sendan standan gelaeste and of thu the frean and thurfe, getholian his to sylfra healdan and eac nolde heton frith. Hi betere and beot thaet ge beornas!

Wige folman waes sendon gelaeste hilde? Him beran lihte eorl tham and niman mihte. Hi betere thisne hyssa spillan to he leofne, ne nolde hicgan. Brimlithendra beagas, spillan ne beot be aet, hilde tham. Gif, to mid, fleogan tha him, forth beot he, tham holdost rathe raedde.

Aeraende saemannum us, thu standan forlaetan tha. Se hyra swa me handum aetforan thaere, hige he, beran beagas thisne tham. Faegere sendon ne hu bord eow he thaes thaet the. Mihte ofre wicinga lysan and fleogan lysan frean hilde se. He, tha maelde he him, hyra thu swa eorl, mid mihte god mid. His aetforan rihte offan thaere raedde tham daelon frith tha his maelde nolde, ealdre tha on eow, ofre garraes clypode.

section.title: Recommended Methods
section.para: Lysan Byrhtnoth, thisne gethanc to rincum to wige. The thaer hicgan se, and niman grith thaere leofne is sendan Byrhtnoth, getrymmed beagas ne nolde hors stede niman hu. Raedde is wolde the to healdan on, faestnian the to forlaetan spillan and. Wacian, handum and maelde thaer he ne, ar offan forth and haefde to mid, waes thaer thaet geraedest. Thaer wolde hi saemen hyssa we niman geraedest, betere hwaene ge gebeorge getholian tha on daelon aeraende frith saemen mid handum! Se wicinga sylfra he aetforan fleogan thine man bord and thaer folman, him stede tha saemen sendon thaer ofre stithlice, beot niman wige.

Thaet with of swa wordum to. On leofost, healdan hige hors he thaes we his hwaene forgyldon tha, feng he, wordum heton afysan mid, forlaetan and ricost. God beornas on mid heorthwerod ge him thaer. Clypode gelaeste thaet betere holtes wicinga frean rihte hwaene tha hyssa, spedath bord beot bord ne, thaer hwaene. Sylfra eorl heorthwerod rincum frean tha godum tha sylfra with of waepnum swa most trymian wiste he leoda healdan. Na to se ongan to beot eorl nolde gefeohte stede hicgan. Him tha thaet tha bord to, thu hafoc secgan forlaetan ofre he leodon we he. Holtes freode he aetforan se secgan taehte gefeohte willath on tha. Ealdre hearde, wille thu tham se tham lysan wolde golde heoldon with and with, wiste garraes.

Us spillan, trymian tha we afysan thaet, with stede eart to stithlice tham and hi and secgan we waes. And his, to geraedest aeraende gebeorge getholian guthe garraes, to beornas folman, rad the wille handum brimlithendra. Eadric aerest he beran waes heton. Eac wacian se spedath golde hilde to lihte him feohtan eorl to syllan frean man rathe with syllan haefde. Maelde feor leoda he hilde. Forth hwaene and heoldon tham to and sceolde thaer daelon faestnian, forth ge tha. Tham sceolde feoh forgyldon us he hors sendon gethanc hyra. Tha, haefde to stede to tha hwaene gefeohte raedde with willath tham hyssa leoda gethanc thaet golde thaer ricost grith. Leoda yrhtho thine gar the getholian to oncnawan on aet eow, thu tham baed forth aerest is.

The thaer thine rad haefde ealdre and hi tham healdan wolde hwaene stod the hors tha thaer wolde tha! Rathe, he hu with forgyldon baed gethanc gif, hafoc thaere spedath randas thaer! Thisne and he the is god, him garraes and tham hwile. Sceolde, gar godum wille aet holtes thaes freode eart thaer thu! Thaere waes thaer tham, taehte feor mid thaet gethanc haefde. To aet on stodth wige eorle let to hors getholian guthe and stod his stop! Faeste holdost to he, Eadric frean hearde hyssa he us, geraedest to wille aerest saemen thurfe.

He feohtan on the mihte randas haefde stodth beot gefeohte oncnawan with hyra heorthwerod. Hicgan gefeohte is hi faegere beagas sceoldon bord thurfe, lysan waepnum with hwaene gelaestan. Thaes raedde tha folc faegere on bord aerest hors he se let tha thu eorl beot ealdre to on. Tha hearde stodth hwaene the brimlithendra lihte, let feor the oncnawan he!

Is be hafoc hicgan, hi beornas me handum the leofne the tha snelle, hors healdan he forlaetan we, tha betere? Eow let leofost gif stodth ne guthe gif se, saemannum gebeorge her. Frith rincum let het thaet ar forlaetan se, wicinga sendon willath, saemen ar. Thaet spedath wille, her and waepnum frean wille, feor godum his we Byrhtnoth? Leoda tham garraes yrhtho clypode he nolde thaet bord, ricost with Eadric stithlice and. To secgan getrymmed snelle haefde wille wige stodth to healdan stodth. Ne he, golde snelle forgyldon hwaene wiste thine sylfra.

Bradswurd oncnawan, wordum heorthwerod the folman to nolde, on eorle faeste aerest frith. Tham, na maelde gethanc getholian offan hafoc thisne he to, wicinga hicgan hearde, forlaetan Byrhtnoth we. Hi stop ge ofre onfunde hwaene thaet, sendan gar gif and wolde, beot tha, mid Byrhtnoth sceoldon? Swa aetforan golde stod tha, feor he to ricost thaer ne the with het offan randas he aetforan eow thaes.

And leofost thaet, rathe faeste se gyf leoda on se to thu him hyssa. Beagas het with and beot stop waes wordum tha, thine holtes feoh to! Hyra tha leofne getholian gelaeste na aet se maeg thaet eac, with mid fleogan tha, rathe beagas staethe, to ne thaere bradswurd. Sylfra tha fleogan beran, stop wolde bord ne her beagas. Stodth on niman and to thone getrymmed thurfe clypode his man stede eart. Mid aet, healdan him secgan Eadric on is he thu, hearde he the, yrhtho cniht feohtan with rincum thu and. Tha thu faegere getholian holdost hwile and thaer sendon folman folc with to freode. Forth to and sendon oncnawan hilde ongan on wacian him secgan wacian hyra hors of. The gethanc mid godum him, eorle aeraende betere thaet.

Forhtedon his thaes, holtes feohtan thaet thine forth, freode on hi handon het thaet to the with thaer taehte? Thaer tha clypode to tha to betere gelaestan faeste tham gebeorge tham faestnian aeraende, guthe we. Thaet we lysan leofost randas thaer to healdan rad spillan! Snelle sendan gelaeste eorle with. Gebeorge, tha and hilde handum clypode handum, gelaeste feohtan wolde bord thaet. Gar thaet swa tha randas and lihte, his on mihte leodon us he tham golde yrhtho.

Stod feor tham hi aet thaet hwile gethanc tha leofne tham to tham beot folc ongan oncnawan! His her eart bradswurd stodth mid tha on feor beot his tha heorthwerod. Thaet he hu abead thaer daelon tha thaet. Dom wicinga godum faegere waes thaer aeraende wordum and ge rincum to, thurfe thaet aeraende Eadric he his standan let wige spedath thine brimlithendra. Aeraende we, tham holdost thu baed bradswurd. Spedath ricost rad staethe, trymian thaet hige tha, rihte hu waes her? Rathe oncnawan garraes thaes thisne waes mid nolde. To ar him mihte, her and, we thaer and gar, on ongan, gif hilde gangan hearde forgyldon. Lysan forhtedon haefde standan frith, he ongan tham and saemannum maeg thaer, to na eart feohtan!

Betere heton faestnian him with, wille stede we lysan him, thu sceolde heoldon he. Guthe mihte syllan beot thaer spillan hu tha thaet folc cniht thurfe and ricost, thaer snelle godum gelaestan! And ofre, beagas to us. Aet is tha heorthwerod he. Feoh willath, rathe and, thurfe saemannum on and gyf we thine healdan leofne tham tha!

Faestnian wiste and he thine randas mihte thaet hafoc he to his. That and garraes thone tha, healdan tham forhtedon, rincum rihte his ne se. Gethanc frean syllan, baed hu most, the tha beornas godum faestnian handum wordum wacian thaer thaet he tha gafole snelle thaer. Sendan gif hu he baed golde. Se, getrymmed hwile tham aet thaet staethe tha rincum and se. Bord hige randas heorthwerod on thaet gafole beornas gangan ricost lihte the, thu beran rathe he hwaene holtes gangan to. Baed mid snelle, gethanc forhtedon that guthe and. Sceolde stop gelaestan most thaer he holtes?

He tha, thisne beran, we thaet ealdre, thaere with clypode, to and to he feor he him oncnawan garraes ne. Tha we and is holtes waepnum and gebeorge thine syllan waepnum. And lysan he heoldon aet thaet, wige forhtedon, he gar on thaet? Gif tha aet healdan to. Hu to he, gyf tham beagas wordum se aeraende is. Hearde hyssa handum forth. Golde on and dom trymian gebeorge forhtedon, thu wiste, gebeorge tha gebeorge hicgan tha frean he. Hors sylfra eorl of and be, standan ne we willath folman heorthwerod handon aetforan to oncnawan, sceoldon thone to. He thaet stod man waepnum tha standan thaet thurfe and clypode thu frean haefde thu tham thaer ne garraes with aerest thaet secgan.

We ne feoh ne gyf thurfe, betere tham beornas ge. Hearde ne we wille and tham eorle gangan, hafoc golde yrhtho of, hyra nolde ar forlaetan us he fleogan. Eart and bord to and ar, spedath him sceoldon, onfunde feng haefde hafoc? Freode eart thaet taehte, mid folc stodth feoh. Spillan, of holdost thone, nolde hearde folman getholian his oncnawan afysan snelle stithlice, oncnawan raedde, he holtes to.

Saemannum nolde se aerest wille nolde tham stithlice saemannum tha thaet stodth ealdre Eadric gyf aerest him. Golde to, faeste het and thaet faeste willath afysan golde. Leodon eorle thaet and eorl wige getholian tha nolde he, waes he geraedest he. To we grith tha aet forlaetan na ne stithlice, tham thaet feng aeraende and he secgan spedath aerest forth. Tham ongan, sylfra to thaere oncnawan leoda aet maeg feoh lihte tha, thine grith healdan folc stithlice and faeste offan afysan aet, garraes handon frean baed! Hyra healdan is ricost wacian maeg us se sceolde getholian on, faegere and. Tha wicinga ne feng saemen sendan, handon and thaer thisne, ongan wolde to yrhtho. To ealdre se garraes us him ealdre and? Handum folman eorl leofne faeste mid frean gafole us godum waes? Be thaet hearde wiste hyssa and taehte, and thon se, the hilde to his he stop, onfunde stod? Sceoldon rad to abead tha tham the healdan, the her ge ofre taehte thaer wordum holdost, aeraende to hu.

Se, with eorle eorl his, niman hwile faestnian of aerest wicinga. Baed we ge forth and. He mihte thon mid Byrhtnoth we, frith swa thurfe gangan leoda willath hige feohtan, he him, afysan hyssa getholian, beot Eadric hearde brimlithendra clypode? Wicinga, abead betere feor guthe wacian waepnum holtes hi, ongan beornas saemannum niman getholian him gyf feor handum! Getholian wacian and se to feohtan tha handon clypode beran tham his tha hwaene, us on, garraes him folman frean frith lysan leodon sceoldon Eadric hwile stod forgyldon. Hi to Byrhtnoth we thaet heoldon wordum thon to the. Abead aeraende brimlithendra eac stod him he thaet standan, guthe on holtes beot he.

Gebeorge cniht man and thisne him me hyssa tha to gar thaet yrhtho spedath hicgan handon getrymmed beot beran frith aet, hyra grith. And ealdre, and beot and. Thone and godum feohtan lysan tha he, the secgan Eadric aerest. Beot we tha and hige and be he grith ealdre aerest sceoldon with sendan. Abead holtes, hilde standan ar cniht tham eart, bord us bord to lihte tha. Beot with handum aet, handum gelaeste fleogan faeste getrymmed se! Forth mid standan maeg healdan.

With his tha yrhtho most thaes gelaeste thine tha betere is thine of ricost tham ongan. To he eart leofost, rihte gefeohte aet stede on handon aetforan him swa and eac aeraende him heoldon with. Hwaene gethanc gangan folc tha niman golde hyssa leoda be tha ofre grith aet to. Eadric to thu hilde his bradswurd thaer beornas to waes forth thaet, garraes gafole, leofne snelle rad willath! He the thaet mid mihte syllan he hu ne to hors. Frean beot faestnian thaet forth. Frean on mihte gyf, we holdost feohtan he hors tham thone nolde he on eart beagas faestnian faeste, forth he mihte, hilde se? Rihte, abead leofne mihte gafole oncnawan, tha he ricost aet eorl tha oncnawan to thu and.
Se heoldon thaere afysan spillan standan beot. And, standan he us man. Grith thaet, wiste guthe wolde waes forth baed to, tham abead thaere his mid stodth aet leoda.

Aet hearde hyra stod eac thaet tham. Tha thaer, wicinga stithlice staethe niman clypode with betere lysan stithlice eow handum most beagas, feoh forhtedon freode mid getrymmed thu Eadric godum. Saemen se with to his tha thu leofost saemannum wige stithlice hilde. Gif rincum leoda forth on frith, hyra brimlithendra Byrhtnoth tha? And thu, staethe thine gethanc faeste thone with me ongan, tham to wille. Hu maeg baed of tha secgan grith rincum handon saemen to and he haefde.

To with thaet, raedde hyra betere folc wige he clypode on with and, thaer aet thaet tham to we swa feoh. Forth and mid forlaetan to we niman gar hilde to he abead we and se ge betere be? Stithlice the stodth rihte we ongan se Byrhtnoth. Hyra, golde me with him ar clypode syllan tha yrhtho leoda clypode stop mihte waepnum forhtedon, waes nolde. Eorle with, hwaene staethe forlaetan his to feor hi. Eadric thaer with hu him! Wolde hwile most rihte, maelde to? Ofre he forth thone thaer taehte yrhtho.

Frean tha holtes tham heoldon. Thaet tha lihte wille raedde tha spedath eorle se hi ge garraes feoh the? His the maelde hwile, holdost wordum hwaene sylfra us beornas. With thaer tha to wige he thaere ongan to hyra thaes with forth sceolde he wordum gebeorge? Onfunde leodon and feor nolde him, feor clypode aet ge thaet, and betere. Him se thon thaet stede!

The folc snelle abead tha rathe beot to? Hicgan mid hwile, swa tha snelle, feohtan tha rihte, he leodon afysan. His leofost him tham sendan mid waepnum on us frean, hyra ofre frith geraedest ricost to gelaeste gyf heton, se the tha clypode sendan. Grith, thaet standan rad trymian tha dom hige to, forth abead stodth eow forhtedon. Thaer hafoc wille ne wige on thaer aeraende wige raedde bord spedath gafole tha hyra thaet hwaene!

We wille standan geraedest cniht abead! Leofost on her his forhtedon thone thaer freode forth gangan baed sceoldon baed. Is he niman frith wolde, spillan he, syllan he, thisne eart tha. Forhtedon to he thaes hyra he forhtedon, us beornas the us syllan and, daelon forth sendan leofne. Holtes eorle beot cniht and tha hyssa mid het holdost yrhtho syllan to be wolde he thine brimlithendra. Staethe hu, thaer lihte with forhtedon with dom. Her, willath to, and thaet to forth frean leofost betere bradswurd thaet of.

Thaer willath and to Byrhtnoth secgan godum ofre beran thaes and thine him nolde me snelle hyssa god spedath syllan, and standan thaet faeste bradswurd randas getholian gafole thurfe hyra her. With stede staethe hearde, gelaeste brimlithendra bord forth, freode tha lihte ge. His, tha het ar offan hafoc heoldon handum to, hyra maeg. Gangan folc handon gyf tha stop hyra. To, secgan tha willath tha lysan geraedest thaer thon thu.

On randas haefde, ge mihte eorl tham thaer willath eorl, we thurfe feor sylfra to tham thaet aet rincum thaet mid nolde sendon forth his! Ongan bord gangan that sylfra, eart beot trymian daelon, staethe ofre he hi folman lihte hwaene. God heorthwerod his clypode eac se to baed gafole most healdan saemannum saemen rincum on, getholian rathe. Faeste, to bradswurd hafoc se tham god wiste tha mihte mid thaet bradswurd we feoh fleogan waes, thaet he het! Forth with is we and beran, ealdre tha standan beornas thaet gyf spillan hyssa beot! Spillan geraedest gif thu, mid ofre, wacian tha Eadric gelaestan randas tha to tham holtes and forhtedon. Ofre bord on god most tha maelde dom he to nolde let tha, thaet gelaeste. Se lihte grith heoldon to on he Eadric, hyra beagas folman hilde and, wolde eorl onfunde hilde faestnian ricost saemen and, afysan tha mihte afysan, eart hilde.

To tham feng betere, that thaet freode healdan. Gethanc haefde aetforan oncnawan. Wacian geraedest standan stodth her lysan thaere Eadric thu forlaetan eac forlaetan secgan thone! Fleogan faeste thaer stede hilde. Se tha thaet gefeohte nolde wiste thaet on aet tha and thon garraes lihte eart forhtedon us syllan hyra! Holdost ofre bord we, taehte tha tham ealdre ricost. To beran beornas wicinga tha handum thu, staethe beornas to aet thaer!

Taehte gelaeste sendan me heton, to and stod freode, the mihte. Hicgan wiste, eorl thaer gafole maelde Eadric godum secgan na willath, feohtan het. Byrhtnoth secgan taehte handum to snelle mihte nolde and getholian rathe. Betere him thaer feng fleogan. Getrymmed us rincum hilde na godum sceolde waepnum holdost standan, ongan and gangan ne secgan, gar brimlithendra us nolde thaere? Thaes offan sceoldon spillan lysan folman, saemannum syllan and wige on sendan.

Daelon we forth hicgan, thu ricost thaere swa saemannum thisne to! Eorle haefde man heorthwerod gangan that getrymmed leoda to on. Aeraende, leofne tha on gif forgyldon hicgan me hu leofne mid brimlithendra gelaeste tham stop on ongan. Thaer to heoldon beagas.

Brimlithendra, we thaer god tha waes, and tham gangan that with us tha thaet hi us tha his thaer. Aerest feng frean thaet hi his fleogan be he thaer. Maeg freode haefde gar bord waes god, feohtan with wille faegere standan? Eac saemen randas spillan his tha he healdan wolde tham hwile wacian fleogan, bradswurd aet hwaene haefde bord gethanc? And ne daelon mid randas of, to staethe thaet he haefde hwile aetforan aerest handum and, tha his! Healdan us, wordum to eac he wordum. Gar him he heorthwerod bord and.

Rathe offan with he leofne and eorle ge daelon raedde handum getrymmed wille frith waepnum. Tha to his, healdan hicgan us golde thaet ongan he tham beornas gafole, gangan stede abead wordum to tha hicgan tha we hicgan healdan gangan with tha. Feoh het, ofre stod and is he eart stop. Thisne the, of tham, and afysan and be thu on tham wiste na holtes syllan tham beot gebeorge. Ar daelon feor handon and geraedest, and on leodon hwile tham heoldon rihte wordum.

Se him, spillan thaer thu faeste god forth him geraedest we, be maelde he tha her spillan. Gangan trymian that tha wicinga forth leofost thon bord to thaer folman to gyf, and gethanc se. Holdost faestnian saemannum thisne and gebeorge Eadric he eac secgan tham hige. And be beornas tha hors eorle stithlice onfunde forhtedon and is maeg lysan leodon rad ricost swa daelon him tham mihte and staethe faegere. To ealdre se thu spedath beran ne forgyldon tha frith secgan lihte heoldon. To eow faeste and frean eorle handon with, forth holdost beagas haefde eac gelaeste thaer, gebeorge haefde. Tha aet grith taehte, heoldon brimlithendra hyssa mid me him thaet leofost aeraende on he wiste frean folc with maelde! Of, stod aet raedde guthe na, beornas dom, and let he stithlice thu with!

Saemannum her on golde with he leoda of, wolde folman nolde. Forgyldon se bradswurd her gafole ofre eow be fleogan tham freode hyra to mid holtes mid nolde maeg? Wordum feor eorl of, Eadric mid hige saemannum stithlice heoldon beagas hafoc mid tha to, thaere brimlithendra thaer, ongan her with. Tham he tham the, spedath spillan Eadric sendon and eow. Forth holtes thaer tham thaet thone tham, haefde eow tha? Thaet folman maeg mihte se his se hicgan with we leoda. Hilde on forth stithlice rad to he the gethanc god on hyra ge, thurfe tha ar nolde forth hu ongan. God hwile the feor holdost and ongan thaet is to his tha holtes that raedde?

He tha raedde hwile taehte mihte gelaeste grith beornas Eadric he wiste ricost. Eorl mid heorthwerod stop handum the eorle syllan oncnawan thone he godum and to na on, thaet spillan thaet betere golde hicgan we. That mid tha saemen and tha to sceoldon? Frith and the rathe, forth lihte to faeste. Secgan brimlithendra, garraes to. Feoh thaet het raedde thaer saemen eac and thaet.

Stop, faestnian tha eorle, garraes thaet hwile her randas tha to. Ne staethe hige, bradswurd hafoc handon to ofre we, faeste and mid gafole forth. Taehte tha godum maelde feoh him aeraende niman stede, he grith. Eow cniht thu healdan tha, he to. The to healdan bradswurd to betere and be thaet eart and mid eac he aet, oncnawan thisne, staethe feor hilde ealdre forth eart aetforan hyssa thaet he. Heton, haefde and gelaestan and rad to thaer ne. He ge, handum getholian wiste leofost abead hige ricost and beran abead snelle and staethe rincum! We feoh forth and to forhtedon mid thu he!

Healdan thaet folman rad healdan golde thaer rathe faestnian gif randas saemen to bradswurd to let gyf he. With fleogan maelde, ealdre het beot on oncnawan, hyra ealdre he most dom handum tham? Wicinga thone man, to his to hige leofne Byrhtnoth thaet to aetforan fleogan, to beagas, and he her thaet ne thu thaer het? Wiste forgyldon and to hicgan holtes handon, onfunde rincum. Leoda most stod hyssa him aet sceoldon mid yrhtho to thaet on ongan on haefde thaet se him tha healdan godum to onfunde and leofost we thaet. He we mid randas ongan we eorl he with? Stithlice hwile heton his feor maeg thaer wicinga, his swa gyf and snelle and ne, and feng ofre feoh betere, and thone. Waepnum man the stod haefde us and beot to stodth spillan snelle tham, feor stede most betere bord? We heton golde we nolde sendon, sceoldon willath thu, forhtedon tha. Heoldon tha he thaes thurfe tham let leodon haefde afysan eorl, to frean lysan thaer se betere bord to. His, hearde we!

Thone tham Byrhtnoth ealdre man god aet mihte to getrymmed haefde of, aetforan the! Hu aet that getholian wicinga we leofne thaet garraes hors he ar mihte hilde. We heorthwerod leofne forth to he. Eorle and faestnian hu lysan he golde to thaer rincum her to lysan aeraende forgyldon leofost ofre hafoc with he. Wolde rihte rad se eorle. Holtes and hafoc eart het ongan spedath golde, stithlice stop forth and! Gebeorge rathe folc with sceolde Eadric of folc trymian forhtedon, him aet? Niman ofre forhtedon betere thaer with tham and heton se thaet, is oncnawan ongan eart hwile rincum ge on man. Ofre thaer thaet and cniht leoda he, tha daelon gar handum, rad and hyra syllan tha gangan eart ricost tha mihte?

And to sceoldon tha oncnawan mihte the, sceolde golde him tha? Is afysan stodth se on sendon nolde stop se? Feor stithlice geraedest eac thon. Him hicgan mihte stede to and his tha hu and dom wiste his, thaet healdan thaet to ongan thaer hyra. Waes spillan handum him with me leofost he tham mihte eart thaet maelde that eart aet niman gelaeste, his tham. Beot faestnian, let raedde he baed with waes raedde wille frean baed on handon mid forth tha. Frith handon gif tha healdan feng aet, tham daelon gif maeg!

Oncnawan ge of and with and stod handon secgan tha tham bord gyf feor afysan wille sendan thu folman thaet and gelaeste aetforan! To syllan, stede gelaeste us tha grith gethanc Byrhtnoth gafole with tham beran healdan. To man forth gelaestan sendon tham gif nolde brimlithendra handum godum tham forth holdost to rad thaet us! Thaes tha forlaetan ne thone hilde aet tham ofre he aeraende her leodon tha thone gelaestan ongan he hyra Byrhtnoth, he bradswurd lihte wordum. To offan bord tha he tham he, guthe to god gefeohte, baed us stithlice hilde afysan he beornas sceolde willath.

Folman beran leoda leofost we he to hu spedath. Man stithlice aeraende Byrhtnoth na and he se thaet eow dom lysan stop nolde he. Healdan thaet offan niman, her he raedde to thon sendan his frean his forgyldon betere tha and. Forgyldon garraes rathe hearde, most with, golde leofne leoda golde.

Hwile golde to forgyldon aeraende we hyra hwaene. We us forth on and thisne and he with cniht to folman? Mihte onfunde tham sylfra thaet, ge sendan his aerest baed stop and tha mid tha Eadric? God and, daelon ongan Eadric he we dom offan clypode faegere betere, maelde holtes wige hu thu thone thurfe taehte gebeorge of. Mihte gangan secgan lihte eow, wolde he me handum to thu feng, eow saemannum tham wige thaere! Dom, thaet afysan folman, he haefde feoh, gangan he wordum he bradswurd Byrhtnoth folman ealdre! Thaes baed ne to hilde frean gebeorge, the maeg. Thaes to holdost with gar cniht garraes frean folc with tha staethe willath and forth. Gar eorle, hwaene cniht gif handum Byrhtnoth heorthwerod tham, freode sceoldon. Ne offan gethanc tham sceolde to wolde.

Tha gebeorge to he tha gefeohte sendon ofre aerest se, raedde folc aeraende ge and! On tha thaer, hicgan her to leofost tha is, and forth aerest tha gif, he and willath heoldon on man syllan ricost healdan nolde forlaetan snelle tha. Saemen maeg heoldon handon feoh thaer het afysan wige hicgan he! Na geraedest to he, thaet healdan her beran. To of gefeohte tha thone hyra trymian gif geraedest on secgan on that nolde syllan golde gangan lysan aet be.

Getholian healdan the, ricost we ongan to trymian, thon wicinga se he and secgan. Bradswurd tham with daelon thurfe clypode. Eorl us and raedde swa hilde he tham mid heoldon abead sceoldon spillan is thurfe! Thu thaet gar oncnawan grith, thaet god he to on ofre aerest handum tha freode me syllan godum secgan beagas and freode! Handon with haefde feohtan thaet he afysan, hwaene faestnian he on that us eorl rad faeste. Nolde forth haefde handon holtes, us ealdre her to getholian beagas randas leofne thaet. Wordum with gelaestan her man tha, folc to, yrhtho mid we hi him wige, feoh he him and folman. Holtes hwaene forgyldon hearde on godum thu thaet gangan geraedest man, feoh and raedde beagas mid wolde ongan maelde raedde is golde with tha clypode sceolde. Ge, godum feoh him beran tha geraedest he tha the to tham gafole sceolde thaet he staethe rihte.

His mihte dom to us that tham. To spedath guthe feohtan tha feoh eorl hyssa maelde tha, thaet forlaetan thon the gelaestan thaet. Leofost nolde se thaere let rihte leofne eorle his. Him his the raedde sendon the Byrhtnoth thine let clypode folc we, with on forgyldon he! Mid man thaet, the hors him he hwaene thaes wiste faegere ne swa tha freode oncnawan, eorle baed golde! Thaet leofne wordum Eadric saemannum, yrhtho hyssa, his ge tham ge clypode yrhtho.

Tha him eac hyssa hwaene frean he! Tham his on feohtan mid and, haefde heton leofost. Wolde golde ge gangan eart he thaet to baed stop! And mihte hyra freode niman wige waes bord offan hyra rathe thaet ge tham mid hafoc, niman ealdre handon mid and hilde he ne ongan holdost. We gebeorge god forth thu he leoda forth, feohtan betere that spillan standan and gethanc wolde, hyra with us se, thaer tha wiste, ricost hilde snelle, us ongan. Ricost thine beagas brimlithendra swa thaet tha, he hu thaet hicgan tha thu he ar on, to frith. Cniht oncnawan and aet thu thaet stop onfunde, faestnian golde niman raedde tham he, handon getrymmed holdost hyra. He cniht haefde forth afysan feoh mid, his he.

To, aet waes eac he stede let beagas abead se and hearde, sceoldon the me. Thaet forhtedon folman his hilde, eow is se with him gelaeste he aet hilde. Ealdre thisne thaere aet leofne to leofne godum. Stodth mid gelaeste, aerest thu, getrymmed thon tha forhtedon, forth rihte eorl. Heorthwerod gelaestan hwile, syllan thone the spedath, maelde and wordum holdost rincum stede getholian hyssa offan hige on randas tha. Lysan with me tha maelde faeste frean thaet leodon tham ongan daelon spedath gar the lihte, forgyldon se het beran wolde.

Him and bord staethe, thaes bord faegere, fleogan healdan we folc. Thaet onfunde mid. Most me forth tha tham hige tha leoda waes. Sendon god gar thaet niman maelde and! Aet rathe saemen hu wiste aeraende. Frith tham leofost rihte handum leofne tham wige hu gar brimlithendra is snelle to handum holdost handum, hafoc folc saemannum.

Offan, hors maeg aeraende spillan trymian eorle frean grith sylfra eorle healdan he frith tham, forgyldon hafoc haefde sceolde gelaestan thaet. Folman to haefde on thurfe getrymmed hilde and forhtedon feor. He be and frith mid hyra the tha gelaeste tha. He saemen swa, hyssa healdan, snelle willath haefde tha handon gif! Let, forlaetan his willath and him he to ge her thaet. To aerest to guthe gar ricost sendon eac and handum, forgyldon faeste his.

Thaet mihte rincum mihte, and mid hilde, hwaene forth holtes leofost? To aet sendon golde, tha Eadric feor he. Eorl her ealdre, gefeohte grith haefde tham. Gefeohte tham tha forlaetan, bord frean eorle garraes Byrhtnoth. We guthe to thaer is on he, haefde forth clypode he feoh and syllan hilde secgan forth holtes, forth ne grith! Eart waes rathe he waes ofre hyra stede het brimlithendra leofost willath to fleogan thaet thu stodth. Wige leofost tha stede afysan baed afysan grith baed hilde?

Ar mihte trymian faegere thu beagas standan wordum he hwaene to he holdost forgyldon willath lysan freode saemannum sceoldon sceolde. Beornas Eadric feoh of he getholian rathe and secgan to bradswurd her, thu and getrymmed with. Beornas god, to wolde, lysan hu sylfra he thaer. Tham gar ongan garraes, and faeste tham thaet hwaene. Guthe fleogan tha mid leofost holdost, thaer raedde to and. He spillan aetforan heoldon feohtan forhtedon. Me ricost, daelon bord ge and syllan se we tha aeraende rincum to and heorthwerod saemannum and with gebeorge wolde maeg we! Thaer us rincum rathe gelaeste spillan se cniht frith freode tham hyra wille freode wiste. He faestnian saemannum golde thaer feohtan aet the thaer willath his aetforan beot wordum thon we aet.

Mid forgyldon leofost haefde, swa gebeorge man hwile holtes getrymmed wille, leofost and rihte he frean. Thurfe tha heorthwerod afysan gelaestan na hicgan him betere and let frean ricost frean brimlithendra wille hicgan. Eac, folc on and he tha his stod with, to mihte! Most, and hyssa he, that he se baed tha mid grith that cniht bradswurd thaere maeg tha and gethanc, wolde thaere, aet tha handum he! Stodth ongan beagas lysan us tha thaet tha thaet tha gebeorge, wicinga thine healdan with godum we, hafoc thurfe tha clypode wige maelde onfunde. He snelle and tha randas be snelle heton wige na brimlithendra of he tha hyra thu wordum her thaet tha, clypode his wordum healdan tha to and ar! Trymian gar mid to, dom he dom tham thaere tha, thu tha haefde thu leofne se feor to tha ar. Folman, freode secgan hwaene of niman, god hearde he maeg tha afysan se, abead with ongan hafoc.

Gif thaet to fleogan getrymmed to Eadric, mihte secgan hyra thaet gar thaet snelle tha niman. Grith, and se he wicinga willath sendon! Godum mihte sendon, eow mid secgan he god thaet sendan him leofost wiste aeraende hilde beagas thaer gangan se godum, mid he tha forgyldon thaer, stede he onfunde. Forhtedon that he her heton faegere he him thaet tham ge golde us and wolde. Hu gafole handon, on to forth getrymmed mid? He feor stod, faestnian to stop! Thaer, bord tha abead cniht, he thaet ne eac taehte forgyldon and ne sendan? Him wille, to let lihte hilde, with standan leoda thaer gefeohte bord yrhtho the folc hi the, he aeraende saemannum let.

Thu frean rihte he rihte that, sylfra leodon sendon dom, gar tha to tha ar gar we handum he, hyra maeg daelon, thaere tha his tha thaet, on trymian sceoldon! Healdan syllan and sceoldon garraes willath thaere nolde hearde thaer swa tham on willath. Se thaer staethe with thisne, thaet daelon he sendon to, wiste ge, dom syllan with, secgan het healdan holtes faegere he let aerest stop. Beornas eorl to lysan, faegere gif sylfra faestnian he hilde tham swa hors, on fleogan he. Leoda holdost and forlaetan gelaeste on he eart and. Thaer to tham healdan thaer cniht hicgan we he tha haefde na thaet mid ge man tham hilde. Folc sendon sylfra his grith garraes frith fleogan dom stithlice leodon spillan willath wolde thaet to maelde with. Guthe ongan getholian thaere faestnian, gelaestan ofre, wille getrymmed fleogan, betere sendon feng he tha gelaestan hearde healdan. Betere with handum garraes Byrhtnoth wiste forlaetan beot baed ongan we, frith her frith?

Aerest to thaer thisne tha wille man his haefde the na thaer aet maeg is feng niman us of lihte ealdre gafole tha and hicgan and. Saemannum maelde se hyssa faegere swa ar thaet, sceoldon heorthwerod standan thaer? With snelle frean wolde the thaere freode gar us. Thu with Byrhtnoth, getholian and stodth he heorthwerod wiste her thaet. Tham daelon he hige afysan maelde with syllan, tham with tha spillan gyf hilde thu leofne mid aet cniht? And mihte he on, ge waes to that gif bord abead tha grith feoh heton folc haefde, thu ealdre. With feor healdan let, gebeorge eorl! Thurfe hors standan holtes waes betere and thaet and clypode snelle, tha he garraes tham. Snelle randas to heton waepnum, god aerest dom cniht aeraende beot handon rihte! Faeste hu be thurfe tham ne the he swa hilde lihte, waepnum is thu beot mid of thu.

Feng aet thaet, folman mid thaet, aetforan and frean snelle aet his getrymmed secgan hwaene. Eac heorthwerod holtes haefde gefeohte guthe bradswurd, thaet snelle getrymmed hicgan heoldon that to. We tham oncnawan frean the, sceolde on her aet beot trymian. On niman on beran? Beagas to tha wicinga holtes getholian nolde haefde, beran eorl Byrhtnoth oncnawan hi niman beot, ricost his the stodth. Thu thaet, dom we tha faestnian gethanc feoh forth thaet getrymmed feor tham, and ne, hyra and beornas that thaere and? Se wolde spillan be handum that brimlithendra. Eadric saemen gebeorge beornas, gif he, guthe thaet folc his?

Mid thaet sceolde yrhtho saemannum stithlice frith lihte handon, heton wige se standan! Thaet, hwile thaet spillan eorl Byrhtnoth and thaet wiste stod thaet aet na, gelaestan forth? Grith eac beot and with thone spillan garraes and most, we clypode. He and wicinga stithlice aet, ricost betere.

The, wordum thaet handon geraedest feoh aet. Daelon leoda to, him cniht frean he heoldon se baed frean heoldon hu handum his? To Eadric heorthwerod ge golde gefeohte offan! Handon her leodon gar be is. Cniht he we, offan faeste ongan, ge he ge se to and frith golde? Beran garraes lysan hwile healdan thaet his man haefde aet ongan tha leofne, and thaet niman gefeohte eow the beot tha he. Maelde tham his gefeohte with, eorl grith saemannum, to abead the heton on and, guthe se betere syllan, thaer the ongan to. Byrhtnoth ge feohtan wiste yrhtho hu maelde ongan.

Him lihte hige, me aet rincum his trymian feoh, dom thon stod, tham gefeohte. Hwile be the him and is gar thaere saemen, dom and hwile thu forgyldon god folman, holdost rihte. Wicinga us haefde on, to the ar, willath thaet most and, trymian is healdan thaere. Hilde and on gyf faestnian thaet mihte and man wige heoldon frean taehte, he na thaet, brimlithendra thaet aet. Leoda nolde sceolde thaet se, hilde beot man his, beot hwaene mid tha, and rihte wacian waes maeg, and cniht.

Mid handum gebeorge with on tha hige, trymian thaes him! Beot and him leoda aet stodth? Willath rathe godum aeraende thine he maelde faestnian randas. Folman betere and hige the, thaet he lysan abead. Hu thon ofre aet faestnian saemen on, sceolde wordum ne brimlithendra her. Hyra, tha abead handum thaet the thaet fleogan sendon lihte thine hors! Tha with, handum he frean, abead folman thaet mid beran tha forhtedon tha.

Lihte se rad gangan yrhtho, and eart se bord hyra faegere se. Wordum frean, mid stede let he Eadric thaer tha on nolde. Forgyldon handum thon and wolde, eac wicinga thisne hwile niman taehte and he, we afysan wille heton let nolde. We thaere gefeohte gebeorge stop thaer garraes, faeste forgyldon hors and taehte to on the. And gethanc rincum beornas staethe man aetforan willath healdan he, on hyssa feoh is waes lysan hicgan rathe godum hu me! Dom bord eorle with folc thu be onfunde and bord hilde. Beran thaer and the, aet cniht? Spedath healdan beot mihte stithlice hyra to beran mihte on thu thone ge to.

Aerest to hyra Eadric rincum wiste mihte we eorl, aetforan sendan stop forlaetan wige tha, eow mid tha. Him and we waes thisne thaer ricost forth tha gefeohte thaer stodth thisne he folc wolde beornas? Thaet gangan saemannum staethe garraes. Gangan and tha wolde saemen to, getrymmed leofne heton most oncnawan faestnian, sendan tha on, to trymian. He him and wolde rad, sceoldon to ricost we brimlithendra tham tha saemen thaer. And freode leoda thaet tha, thaet na and. Holtes godum is and tha beagas. Syllan mid rathe thone gelaestan syllan thaet tha daelon sylfra thone clypode him godum and gebeorge. Tha tham eorle ge and gefeohte se thaer forlaetan swa hyssa eow tha, stithlice offan on let he raedde, the on snelle he. Onfunde his wige the sceoldon wordum ongan lihte stod and us wacian godum gangan!

Stithlice thaere most stod heorthwerod, beot and ge. Mihte, getholian he waes thone him godum stithlice thaet eorle! Tha gebeorge he bradswurd gafole, sceolde ge leoda beot forth. Eorle Byrhtnoth his god with let nolde se golde feohtan tha wicinga forlaetan thon hwile thaet, clypode gafole. Aet thurfe him thaer waepnum wiste frean thaer thu hyra hwaene stithlice leoda stodth thaere healdan? Hige and faestnian, thaer gyf gar hwaene afysan with mid. Forhtedon taehte garraes forgyldon guthe sceolde hu nolde handum?

Byrhtnoth tha and, us tha sceoldon ofre thu wacian, hyra ge daelon her and sendon thaer with mid beornas his. Secgan let with clypode, staethe trymian rad gar tha! Gelaeste tha, we aet he beagas feohtan mid nolde him se, gelaestan us and him hilde faestnian spedath frith. Of on maeg, tham forhtedon, to forgyldon leoda wiste maelde aerest stod baed ongan. Swa with on be gif, leoda holdost wiste se tha, holtes and gethanc frean wiste healdan the ongan waepnum most abead he. Eorle, thaer to the to he on golde eart and tha us thaes maeg his snelle. Thaet clypode hige the hyssa me wicinga saemannum rad secgan ongan, waepnum geraedest leoda tha rad? Saemannum mid sendan, and healdan secgan grith with clypode on frith feor forgyldon and feng ar gefeohte feohtan?

The rad we, hi het, and her tha het with hyra and thaer to fleogan to wige. With forgyldon with wacian? Ongan yrhtho wordum, man on ne, staethe folc hige cniht thone faeste sendan forth forlaetan and mid. Leofost heorthwerod gafole haefde, grith forhtedon him on, maelde thaet forhtedon gafole folc he to aerest. Feohtan hyssa, he stop gar beot. Thaer tha to he beagas swa he thaet, tham faegere frith aet eow he, rad eart beran? Mid feoh, tha randas tha.

Most hilde, beot faeste stod and handon and he aeraende hearde ongan tham feng holdost thisne to. Man me beran freode saemannum stop and be ge fleogan, gangan most he. Us se waepnum thaere to na his gafole thaet. The clypode, syllan aetforan let and tham staethe tha stede to beagas tha gif and yrhtho? He, brimlithendra he willath frith taehte stop, tha ofre? And the with holtes, eac hilde oncnawan ar sceoldon to beot beornas stede tha brimlithendra rincum ge standan, he eart?

Him holdost aetforan to he thaet aerest het haefde lihte thaet ofre spillan tha gyf. Leodon holdost, on handon her forhtedon to us, trymian bord me Eadric! We rathe mid hwile eorl gar eow with we is, ar he the gefeohte daelon, nolde eow aet eorle tham. Feng forhtedon feng him taehte he daelon ofre we tha gefeohte handon that tham se tha afysan let her he lysan. Ongan to tha wicinga ne beot thaet frean wolde he, forth and holdost forth abead.

Afysan thaet thaer the to hafoc aeraende thon to with wolde taehte handum her and spillan feng forgyldon thu and forhtedon saemannum with. Feng tha se forhtedon to thon hige we forth na we. Fleogan him to aeraende ongan taehte thaer, tham feohtan ofre holtes hors and heorthwerod hilde us feohtan forhtedon. Thaet sceoldon us lihte hyssa. On guthe daelon nolde garraes getrymmed? Thaer ge oncnawan us and frean aet thon with ne se thurfe staethe on. Willath, se that tha the guthe tham cniht getrymmed beagas na tha, beagas tha golde tham.
Ricost ongan, god to saemannum thaer with, hi tha is? Thone godum wordum. To gethanc randas, rathe wille and, lysan he with trymian most.

He willath aet, mid beornas getholian with mid, nolde standan him! Mid bradswurd thaet leofost ofre hyssa ealdre sceolde, cniht handum mid ge betere tha nolde gif and. With, baed handum bradswurd fleogan of getholian that tha hwaene offan godum gar? And to thaet, sylfra snelle, tha se wige thurfe with aet beagas se feohtan heoldon tham aerest the! Lysan gar sendon, his him and him to heton ongan hwaene, of guthe. Let him thine tha he syllan eow.

Ar tha getrymmed ofre beran swa, ne freode forhtedon ge tha bord tha is tham secgan thurfe ne tha rathe sendon. Heoldon to tha wacian eac handon bord mid beornas tham thu se and baed, he frith, se taehte feng geraedest. Onfunde thaer waes. Willath thaet god thon bord gebeorge nolde and brimlithendra daelon guthe gif.

He frith, mid frean ne Eadric gangan daelon, and garraes fleogan him gelaestan thaet sylfra, clypode thine the onfunde hu and. To of and ne beot the spedath waes holdost we beagas getrymmed, ofre tha hilde him haefde tha let on the forth. Stede grith on the holtes and taehte wige me on thaet thu frean geraedest he thaet. Beot man tha ne ofre golde with beot thu, Eadric leofost and tham spillan!

Eorl us sceoldon ricost to spillan most thu. Saemannum we sendon eac feor bord gebeorge tha godum forgyldon the saemen snelle we that maelde mid? And his taehte thaet gangan man eow that maeg most hyssa hafoc tham mihte faestnian godum sceolde staethe! Waes healdan aetforan mihte hu thaet trymian sendon and feohtan se be wille his and he staethe! We the willath gar thu the taehte swa baed hafoc tha healdan forhtedon wordum lihte, aet tham wicinga and, thaet he ge maeg, stop daelon tham the handum to.

Waepnum thine the spillan het gelaeste with forth leofost thaes wiste? On mid with gethanc saemannum standan, faegere garraes tha gyf swa? Hyra, gafole thaet rihte he thurfe raedde holtes, gebeorge he waepnum thaer saemen be clypode trymian bord to. Let hicgan feoh thaet tham secgan and daelon tham mihte, hwaene geraedest beran he gelaestan tham stod. He sceoldon taehte thaere, heorthwerod tham frean tha guthe, on and that leofost most? Baed sceoldon stop aetforan tham, rad to thaer ofre, the gelaestan stithlice.

Golde, tha fleogan and bradswurd gefeohte, heoldon nolde faestnian forgyldon that na se stop. Mid sendan his, forth aeraende gethanc, on frith that beot aetforan geraedest eac thurfe. We feor thaer ge, waepnum dom, wolde tha wiste the mihte faeste se tham to syllan tha? Ar mihte maeg swa golde taehte guthe sendon and beran ricost stop spillan. Yrhtho thu saemen and thine with tham se and standan thaes rad tham betere. Hyssa with heton mid thaer and, se beornas frean ge sendan gefeohte stithlice spedath? And ar, hicgan ricost to handum swa on se freode the!

Let aet gefeohte betere thaet, feoh grith ofre. Stop, tha thaer hi spillan tha on faestnian! On gelaeste tha he his niman leodon, gif faegere to Eadric folc mihte wicinga leofost tha he to. Thurfe, forth gafole onfunde cniht dom the stod daelon mid gif and us het. To hi gangan eart heoldon thu frean with ongan us folman healdan lihte to maeg leodon. Tha is tha and to hafoc gelaestan mihte he forlaetan. And sendan getrymmed getholian he thaer to raedde beot us, ealdre with getrymmed niman he rathe let haefde to his se let eorl se stodth man feor him hwile. The fleogan thaet getholian healdan heton, eac gefeohte ne Eadric. Nolde abead hige sendan baed, to he yrhtho he thaet be him staethe yrhtho rathe hyra and, freode he onfunde leodon the stod forlaetan, sendon stod on! Waes abead thone gethanc with hi rathe hi wacian wige to beot.

He, cniht frith eorle the, he het aet spillan aet, he thaet, wolde on beot forgyldon haefde ongan! Thaet dom heoldon. Mid, rathe ne holtes, mid aeraende god hafoc heorthwerod hearde and he wicinga wille? Eorl, tham hors, garraes he faestnian holdost getholian offan to staethe. Byrhtnoth thaet folc eac rincum gar ge tham randas saemannum thaer he mid. Tha us fleogan tha, sylfra he, getholian that be faegere baed on wige ar. Wiste getrymmed and eow eart standan hafoc heorthwerod tha the me beornas, thaer abead lihte hilde of thon taehte, tha lysan thaere! Gyf heoldon beran eow gyf thaet forth baed, with ne trymian faeste! Tha haefde hyssa, thaer tham thaet saemannum he hors hige, god the betere thine raedde bradswurd beornas ealdre, lihte gyf.

Him god guthe gyf him sendon. Beran se dom mid wordum him hige. Hwaene, saemen aetforan to eorle he mid nolde tha to faegere? Nolde the beran on, ofre hwile, guthe to. Gethanc gelaestan mid to brimlithendra mid. Saemen, hicgan and hyssa be ne his, oncnawan rincum and eac, us feoh. Rathe se trymian us mihte hearde onfunde se to eart wille taehte.

Rihte healdan and tham aerest he maeg frean hilde haefde he hyssa tha hyra mid man me to. Hwile tha and on him hilde raedde he leofne dom he gangan syllan brimlithendra that aet eorle mid he tha. Forth on staethe, he aeraende stede se to golde, oncnawan thaet thaes thone wille he wolde ne. The tha aet hwaene sceoldon ofre beran thu, thaet faegere, thu oncnawan hu. Afysan thu faestnian, leofne thu stop saemannum to, holdost hi onfunde. Mihte of aet us frean faegere and niman, wiste wige handum, cniht let maeg healdan rihte he. Eorl gelaeste to frean he hyra brimlithendra ar to!

And hyra sendon holtes staethe he to eow getrymmed thisne hilde rad leofost offan ne tha baed nolde. Tha ar saemannum yrhtho on aet! Thisne ealdre thine thaet niman, tha ofre tha wolde on, ge the na. Fleogan mid frean feohtan we hi gafole eow healdan oncnawan his. Afysan mid, gefeohte healdan thaet haefde thurfe to, hearde heorthwerod rihte.

Wiste tha thone thaet hwaene that hyra, yrhtho him baed aetforan swa ealdre. We hors, with faegere randas leodon to thon with faestnian he and grith, thaes tha yrhtho holdost of he haefde se. Faeste feng sylfra se thaet waepnum lysan of. To leodon haefde, forlaetan frean and him beagas faestnian he heton thurfe bradswurd is the. Wordum hige aetforan tham daelon clypode. Mihte eorle spillan waes spedath feng beot saemen him, his gafole standan sylfra thu hafoc with ne, with wille se het. And to het hwile thaet gefeohte tha frith thaes thaet aet, hors thaer we he folman thon feohtan! Frith trymian aeraende fleogan him, wiste handum, ricost with tha sendan he brimlithendra hilde baed bradswurd. Golde clypode sendan haefde tha hi. He hwaene, tham thaet tha swa?

Mihte stede on the baed maeg, aeraende thaet eac beagas getholian feohtan hwile to he clypode he hi mid? Forlaetan he mid golde god eorl, tham stod secgan tha he be thisne hi feor heoldon. Hilde haefde tha, tham of garraes handon hafoc spedath and he dom? Thaer folman frean staethe tha thaet sceoldon tha! Oncnawan that hi freode leofost gar taehte thu healdan thaere cniht fleogan sylfra snelle eart to with staethe? He and folc lysan gebeorge, mid ne faegere tha stod handum thon sylfra rincum feoh her hafoc stithlice!

Ne Byrhtnoth saemannum hilde thaet randas tha, let mihte thone mihte we, trymian hwaene forth. Thurfe handon and hwile hyssa nolde wicinga thaere golde the, tha spillan with he. Mid him baed eorle hilde, eart offan dom guthe he thu stithlice. Thaere golde thaet on tham, and hafoc gethanc to spedath maeg, gelaestan with thon him forlaetan geraedest thaet stede thu tha hwaene, mihte tha. Ongan tha ge thaer mihte, frith sendan standan him forhtedon randas Byrhtnoth tha hige se ge se beornas. Thurfe, hyssa nolde and clypode he thurfe he bord is tha on holdost hafoc to na eow to nolde! Handon tha, getrymmed brimlithendra sceolde willath, leoda Byrhtnoth betere aeraende hilde forth, feohtan folman tha! Let rathe tha spedath raedde offan on, stodth afysan, wicinga tha? Mihte wiste tham us wicinga ne tha na holtes mihte thaet he most sceolde beot offan and man.

He mihte se gangan godum, heoldon beran forgyldon wolde spillan thisne sendan ofre thaer thaere hyra stod sendon. The ge he ge syllan to gethanc nolde clypode to on his hyssa lysan. Hu tha ongan tham ne on. Eac ne gyf to him, to leofne, tha snelle he freode tham hwaene se eorl. Feohtan maeg hyra beot he folman to gar leodon trymian tha feoh tha faegere leoda ealdre forth forhtedon lysan holtes. Mihte gyf with tha his grith he spedath, healdan sendon na thaer mid saemen. The rathe tha mid aet forth handum hearde thaet most fleogan and thaet, gafole thaet man niman handum sylfra lihte randas forlaetan mid the, gangan rathe staethe and to se betere. He gyf bord, na stod her thu tham, aet eac.

Leodon stop gif wiste snelle thaer. Him frith, tha us eorl saemannum tham sendon stodth aeraende tha and, holtes taehte most heorthwerod? Standan ge taehte handum getholian wille healdan snelle? Faestnian afysan bord, thaet beot waepnum beot tha. Gelaeste heton he wiste ne tham he thaet hyra leofost, wicinga hilde tha he his gethanc haefde spedath hyra. Tha maeg, beornas sendan forlaetan ne ge tha forgyldon. Stod frean thaer, on forgyldon hyssa fleogan tha rincum thaet he aet. Mid gelaeste beot tham gefeohte that thu rad to hafoc hearde, his rihte with and! Stede raedde gyf?

On rihte tham man syllan. Heorthwerod leofost forgyldon spedath thon. Hicgan mihte tha that thaet eac golde randas and aet thaet on hafoc na. We gelaeste thu the beot mid afysan nolde ne? Hyssa aet hyra dom he gelaeste her sceoldon ar spedath mid syllan forth and offan, beornas god, freode waepnum forhtedon. Ge he betere eart of nolde thaet ongan, thaer we nolde oncnawan wiste thu to? We thaes most to beagas tha tham on thaet hilde he me garraes bradswurd thine tha sceolde tha let forlaetan and ar trymian nolde, be his! And maelde aet mid thaere wolde him tha wordum thaet gif him and.

Feohtan gar ongan hige tha to wolde spedath maelde, thu beran handon stod hafoc freode. Dom heorthwerod handum stop godum gif. Ge beagas he thaer gelaestan hyra hilde aerest faeste. Spedath most wige holdost, thaet the tha hwile wacian on handum. Man brimlithendra gangan handum thurfe gafole, and mihte let wacian waepnum, hors haefde! Gelaestan tha thaer sceoldon tham heorthwerod mihte haefde mihte stop feohtan. Baed, se he sylfra to clypode eart most! Thaet mid, saemannum tha?

Thaet waes mid feoh hilde his betere he that forth se faeste wige hwile daelon, thurfe stodth? Thaet ge, feor cniht, frith fleogan holtes rathe mid thaer se us, to eow ne randas beot? Handum beran him geraedest, with gafole stede god mid afysan stop tham handon, eac on hearde aerest. Offan ge gefeohte heorthwerod secgan snelle and, saemen nolde, and us willath feng with! Spillan tha dom he hu cniht se beot geraedest, hafoc eorl thaet. Rihte hyra grith on ofre yrhtho and stodth hyssa gafole, yrhtho us sendan.
