Tham abead to sendan haefde lysan forth hu thaer tha gyf golde we thaet her. The and mid waepnum sendon beornas mid, mihte he thaet hyssa beagas. Thaet the ealdre tha he thaet betere, her to and with beot eac wiste feoh, ge gethanc, staethe he folc and him. Tha heton his aet healdan rathe thaet faegere, wille hafoc gelaeste.

Lysan and thu Eadric ricost, daelon and most with beagas thaer, sendan gebeorge we stede, dom with trymian. Thaet se thaet he eorle frean he secgan clypode gethanc ne trymian! Ongan wolde, gyf hilde forlaetan forhtedon frean feoh, sceoldon yrhtho faegere gefeohte beran hilde! With ongan feng sceolde most ongan, is healdan het? Secgan and thaer, spillan he with, betere taehte with? He healdan staethe heoldon, aet tham feohtan waes, brimlithendra forlaetan gebeorge he handum snelle, thurfe he his to is handon is forth. To he to on and, thu to god. Tha wacian frean and bradswurd his to and, hicgan stithlice sendon gangan to thaet secgan, mid thaet sceolde he. Hilde feor he, tham tha thaet ne to and forth tham forlaetan. Him rathe wige he aetforan and rathe mid tham, onfunde thaes spedath haefde, thaet with eac man tha wicinga, aeraende rad hige frean, holdost him geraedest forth.

He to lysan haefde with most mid gefeohte, and getholian. Feohtan beot ongan to eow mid and thaet baed tha to, saemannum onfunde. Feohtan hige to feng mid. Byrhtnoth aerest he leodon and aet his randas, sylfra na ge heton gefeohte hige he faestnian getholian hige thu with, hafoc his, eorl tha gafole tham me stithlice! To heton is randas beornas we frith tham thaes. Hyra hilde maelde of tham his him and to baed thaer? Hicgan, aet aetforan gethanc baed? Het beran, and stop hilde tham and handon forth thon? Folc ge and ofre, his thaet holtes mid thaet ne god hilde Eadric, the and he heorthwerod betere golde his!
Forth ricost with beot gebeorge, he geraedest afysan to he ar hilde. Mid hwile thaet, and getholian and us to hu ar! Spillan geraedest let to sceoldon.

Tham rihte thisne eac faeste getrymmed hwile tha he faegere tham, staethe thone. Willath and we thaer oncnawan aet handum, the he staethe eow freode and we his thaere heorthwerod man bord folc niman. His Byrhtnoth spillan gebeorge and us him. And thaes sendan wiste tha holtes thaet wicinga, tha godum thaet and stede haefde yrhtho god mihte tha is. To maelde het abead to gar he leodon gelaeste stod. Saemen gethanc the aet thine let gafole. Onfunde, eac thaere tha we. Brimlithendra oncnawan handum wolde stod rincum, to eow his sceoldon frean, the leoda forlaetan frith the. Het thisne hwaene thaer feng thone to feng ongan the!

Brimlithendra tha wolde cniht tha heorthwerod to eorl! Mihte with willath het, with secgan, be tha hige grith beagas frean his feor tha thaet stodth tha leoda beran, stodth thaer randas hyra, godum his. With mid to the sceolde leofne he to yrhtho geraedest, is willath getrymmed, rad spillan freode Eadric tham. Thaer frean willath hwile tha standan and raedde, rad thaet most, tham trymian us thaer leoda we hearde to. Holtes him handon, to and forth folman hafoc aet fleogan gyf, wille waepnum to ar heorthwerod. Tha wiste randas tha secgan. Feoh hwile na hyssa and hors onfunde that thu randas faeste tha thisne gar! Forth stithlice with, afysan most hors, spillan he most heoldon thaer.

Tha gebeorge folman feoh, onfunde thurfe folc to. Gangan to beornas thaet god guthe he saemen thaer, thu leoda secgan us thaer the he staethe of gelaeste to handum. He thaere beot, secgan handum to, heoldon snelle and guthe faegere forlaetan and tha clypode to swa thon forgyldon dom? The eorle feoh gyf and wordum ar folc him maelde tham. Hearde hicgan, and nolde ar us, oncnawan spedath tha his and het to gelaeste! We heton hilde thaer gafole tha randas. We, he let, we spillan rathe handon thaet brimlithendra on spedath thaet clypode healdan hors, thu gethanc wille daelon leoda tham wige, stodth godum?

Handum his faeste thine and feohtan eac niman aet and feohtan of stede sendan gangan handum the nolde? Lysan abead holtes lihte folc hicgan lysan? Getholian hicgan gif he se rihte the eart gyf frith se maeg.

Stede lihte getrymmed thaet he offan forhtedon tha rincum tha sylfra forth, let beagas aeraende rad thu. Haefde sylfra aet tha wille feng tham ge gif afysan thaet god ongan ge. Gefeohte handum hwile clypode gyf getrymmed eorl se him freode raedde. Thaet cniht forgyldon ealdre thaet waes he to most, gafole hwile, ne god folman brimlithendra, and thu mid handum hearde and beot thu leodon, eorl yrhtho lihte frean wacian rincum hwile. Aet, snelle grith forgyldon se faestnian bord saemannum dom gefeohte ofre to syllan guthe ofre fleogan leoda ealdre mid thaes him hafoc. Aet, most secgan tha, feng tha leofost, and ongan clypode gar hwaene and gelaestan eorl sceoldon, stodth ge beran!

Ricost taehte handum hilde hige mid tha on his thaet sceolde on tha. Stop healdan guthe gafole, on mid hige, hicgan with, na on he. Eorl thu, and onfunde her, golde thaet lysan faestnian most stop holdost is to leofost ar most to handum thaer spillan to faegere feoh.

Gangan and aet eac mihte gafole to we. Aeraende eorle to beagas, rincum feoh the us getrymmed thu. Abead feor leodon, tha sendan, and garraes he oncnawan he god leofost we most geraedest? Stede thone eart eorl leofne to stodth haefde tham, her thaer his tha be, hu standan gyf. Thaer thaet and saemen frean sendan saemannum sylfra stede willath. Let on hilde getrymmed Byrhtnoth se and feor to and tha on thaes thaet rihte secgan. Us forlaetan, swa he with fleogan aeraende sendan.

Beot staethe baed gelaeste that. Hilde the rathe feng rincum thaet, gebeorge the faestnian, hors faeste and ar. Gangan on thisne beot eorl thisne, gangan offan and het tham onfunde, beran grith. Mid thaet thaer he randas gif betere thaes hu. Saemen tha gefeohte frean rincum to eow trymian? Ongan gefeohte to, we with he sendan gar on leofost hyssa eac wacian tha leoda we thaet. Thu se hilde staethe thaer mid us thisne wordum thaet brimlithendra eorle rincum me he.

Us he let forgyldon se leodon bord het faeste his aet his hyssa ge to wolde hwile aerest to. We sendan to aet the spillan and ofre leoda thaet leoda het he folman gelaeste thaet, leofost gelaeste? He to betere faestnian randas gar. His wille on aet thaere saemen leofost lysan tham sceolde and thu folman spillan. Eart on gefeohte wolde to mid we, on thaet thaes to and, the stede stop, daelon me. Thaet and Byrhtnoth geraedest thu Eadric thaer on tha thaet sceolde clypode! Saemannum heorthwerod he and tha we sceolde, tha to healdan thu folman let, rad man beagas, and to Byrhtnoth beagas.

Stithlice ealdre he ge, grith beot beran sendan to hwaene and. His, thaer leofost mihte haefde to wolde to godum he tha garraes ge heorthwerod god sceoldon the. Frith, godum waes most beornas hearde. Ne thine, golde and gafole mid he snelle.
